    <script type="application/javascript">
        window.standaloneContest = false;
        function adjustViewport() {
            var screenWidthPx = Math.min($(window).width(), window.screen.width);
            var siteWidthPx = 1100; // min width of site
            var ratio = Math.min(screenWidthPx / siteWidthPx, 1.0);
            var viewport = "width=device-width, initial-scale=" + ratio;
            $('#viewport').attr('content', viewport);
            var style = $('<style>html * { max-height: 1000000px; }</style>');
            $('html > head').append(style);
        }

        if ( /Android|webOS|iPhone|iPad|iPod|BlackBerry/i.test(navigator.userAgent) ) {
            adjustViewport();
        }
    </script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var queryMobile = Codeforces.queryString.mobile;
    if (queryMobile === "true" || queryMobile === "false") {
        Codeforces.putToStorage("useMobile", queryMobile == "true");
    } else {
        var useMobile = Codeforces.getFromStorage("useMobile");
        if (useMobile === true || useMobile === false) {
            if (useMobile != false) {
                Codeforces.redirect(Codeforces.updateUrlParameter(document.location.href, "mobile", useMobile));
            }
        }
    }
</script>

        window.stop();

    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(document).ready(function () {
    (function () {
        jQuery.expr[':'].containsCI = function(elem, index, match) {
            return !match || !match.length || match.length < 4 || !match[3] || (
                    elem.textContent || elem.innerText || jQuery(elem).text() || ''
            ).toLowerCase().indexOf(match[3].toLowerCase()) >= 0;
        }
    }(jQuery));

    $.ajaxPrefilter(function(options, originalOptions, xhr) {
        var csrf = Codeforces.getCsrfToken();

        if (csrf) {
            var data = originalOptions.data;
            if (originalOptions.data !== undefined) {
                if (Object.prototype.toString.call(originalOptions.data) === '[object String]') {
                    data = $.deparam(originalOptions.data);
                }
            } else {
                data = {};
            }
            options.data = $.param($.extend(data, { csrf_token: csrf }));
        }
    });

    window.getCodeforcesServerTime = function(callback) {
        $.post("/data/time", {}, callback, "json");
    }

    window.updateTypography = function () {
        $("div.ttypography code").addClass("tt");
        $("div.ttypography pre>code").addClass("prettyprint").removeClass("tt");
        $("div.ttypography table").addClass("bordertable");
        prettyPrint();
    }

    $.ajaxSetup({ scriptCharset: "utf-8" ,contentType: "application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8", headers: {
        'X-Csrf-Token': Codeforces.getCsrfToken()
    }});

    window.updateTypography();

    function showAnnouncements(json) {
        //info("j=" + JSON.stringify(json));

        if (json.t != "a") {
            return;
        }
        // console.log("Got announcement from channel");
        setTimeout(function() {
            Codeforces.showAnnouncements(json.d, "en");
        }, Math.random() * 500);
    }
    if (Codeforces.getParticipantChannel()) {
        Codeforces.subscribe(Codeforces.getParticipantChannel(), function(json) {
            showAnnouncements(json);
        });
    }

    if (Codeforces.getContestChannel()) {
        Codeforces.subscribe(Codeforces.getContestChannel(), function(json) {
            showAnnouncements(json);
        });
    }

    if (Codeforces.getGlobalChannel()) {
        Codeforces.subscribe(Codeforces.getGlobalChannel(), function(json) {
            showAnnouncements(json);
        });
    }

    if (Codeforces.getUserChannel()) {
        Codeforces.subscribe(Codeforces.getUserChannel(), function(json) {
            showAnnouncements(json);
        });
    }

    $(".clickable-title").click(function() {
        Codeforces.alert($(this).attr("title"));
    }).css("position", "relative").css("bottom", "3px");


    Codeforces.reformatTimes();
    Codeforces.initializePubSub();

    Codeforces.setupSpoilers();
    Codeforces.setupTutorials("/data/problemTutorial");
        });
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(document).ready(function () {
            $("input.search").focus(function () {
                if ($(this).attr("data-isPlaceholder") === "true") {
                    $(this).val("");
                    $(this).removeAttr("data-isPlaceholder");

        $(document).ready(function () {

        delay: 200,
        width: 200,
        selectFirst: false,
        matchContains: true,

    });

            "userHandle", $(this).find(".handleBox").val()
        );
        window.location = link;
        return false;
    });
        });

t" class="content-with-sidebar">
<div style="margin-bottom:2em;">


<div class="topic" topicId="55691">
    <div class="title">
            <a href="/blog/entry/55417">            <p>Educational Codeforces Round 31</p>
</a>

<script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $(".blogEntry-55417-error").hide();

        $(".attach-blogEntry-55417-to-contest-link").click(function () {
            Codeforces.facebox(".attach-blogEntry-55417-to-contest-form-holder", "http://st.codeforces.com/s/81047");

            $("#facebox .attach-blogEntry-55417-to-contest-form").submit(function () {
                if ($(this).find(":disabled").length === 0) {
                    $("#facebox .blogEntry-55417-error").hide();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-55417-resource-submitting-indicator").show();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-55417-resource-submit").attr("disabled", "disabled");

                    //noinspection JSUnusedGlobalSymbols
                    $.post("/data/blogAndContest?action=attachBlogToContest", {
                        blogId:"42750", contestId:$("#facebox #blogEntry-55417-contestId").val(),
                        blogEntryId:"55417",
                        resourceType:$("#facebox #blogEntry-55417-resourceType").val()
                    }, function (json) {
                        var validated = true;

                        for (var key in json) {
                            if (json.hasOwnProperty(key) && key.indexOf("error__") === 0) {
                                validated = false;
                                $("#facebox .blogEntry-55417-" + key.substring("error__".length) + "-error").show();
                                $("#facebox .for__blogEntry-55417-" + key.substring("error__".length)).text(json[key]);
                            }
                        }

                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55417-resource-submitting-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55417-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        if (validated) {
                            $.facebox.close(
++++++++++++++++++23+++++++++++++++++++++++
);
                            if (json["success"] === "true") {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("Blog has been successfully attached to selected contest");
                            } else {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("There is unexpected error while attaching blog to the contest");
                            }
                        }
                    }, "json");
                }

                return false;
            });

            var contestSelect = $("#blogEntry-55417-contestId");
            var popupContestSelect = $("#facebox #blogEntry-55417-contestId");

            if (popupContestSelect.is(":disabled")) {
                $.post("/data/contests?action=getContestListWithEditableResources", function (data) {
                    if (data["result"] === "success") {
                        var contests = data["contests"];

                        for (var i = 0, contestCount = contests.length; i < contestCount; ++i) {
                            //noinspection StringLiteralBreaksHTMLJS
                            var contestOptionHtml = "<option value=\"" + contests[i]["id"] + "\">"
                                    + contests[i]["id"] + " - " + contests[i]["name"] + "</option>";
                            contestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                            popupContestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                        }

                        contestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#blogEntry-55417-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#blogEntry-55417-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        popupContestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55417-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55417-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");
                    } else {
                        alert("Can't receive contest li
++++++++++++++++++24+++++++++++++++++++++++
st");
                    }
                }, "json");
            }

            return false;
        });
    });
</script>



        <span style="position:absolute;right:0;top:0.05em;margin-right:1em;display:inline;font-size:0.75em;">
            <div style="margin-top:0.25em;">

    <div class="content">
        <div class="ttypography"><p>Hello Codeforces!</p><p>On <a href="http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?day=27&amp;month=10&amp;year=2017&amp;hour=17&amp;min=5&amp;sec=0&amp;p1=166">October 27, 17:05 MSK</a> Educational Codeforces Round 31 will start.</p><p>Series of Educational Rounds continue being held as <a href="https://harbour.space/">Harbour.Space University</a> initiative! You can read the details about the cooperation between <a href="https://harbour.space/">Harbour.Space University</a> and Codeforces in the <a href="http://codeforces.com/blog/entry/51208">blog post</a>.</p><p>The round will be <strong>unrated</strong> for all users and will be held on extented ACM ICPC rules. After the end of the contest you will have one day to hack any solution you want. You will have access to copy any solution and test it locally.</p><p>You will be given <strong>6 problems</strong> and <strong>2 hours</strong> to solve them.</p><p>The problems were prepared by Ivan <a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/BledDest" title="Candidate Master BledDest">BledDest</a> Androsov, Vladimir <a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/0n25" title="Candidate Master 0n25">0n25</a> Petrov, Alexey <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/Perforator" title="Grandmaster Perforator">Perforator</a> Ripinen, Mike <a class="rated-user user-admin" href="/profile/MikeMirzayanov" title="Headquarters, MikeMirzayanov">MikeMirzayanov</a> Mirzayanov and me.</p><p>Good luck to all participants!</p><p>Congratulations to the winners: <table>  <tbody>  <tr>  <th>Rank</th>  <th>Competitor</th>  <th>Problems Solved</th>  <th>Penalty</th>  </t

    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(document).ready(function () {
    $(".topic-vote-up-55691").click(function () {
        $.post("/data/topic/vote", {topicId: 55691, _tta: Codeforces.tta(), topicRevisionId: 128644, vote: +1}, function(data) {
            Codeforces.showMessage(data);
        }, "json");
        return false;
    });
    $(".topic-vote-down-55691").click(function () {
        $.post("/data/topic/vote", {topicId: 55691, _tta: Codeforces.tta(), topicRevisionId: 128644, vote: -1}, function(data) {
            Codeforces.showMessage(data);
        }, "json");
        return false;
    });
        });
    </script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $(".blogEntry-55402-error").hide();

        $(".attach-blogEntry-55402-to-contest-link").click(function () {
            Codeforces.facebox(".attach-blogEntry-55402-to-contest-form-holder", "http://st.codeforces.com/s/81047");

            $("#facebox .attach-blogEntry-55402-to-contest-form").submit(function () {
                if ($(this).find(":disabled").length === 0) {
                    $("#facebox .blogEntry-55402-error").hide();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-55402-resource-submitting-indicator").show();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-55402-resource-submit").attr("disa
++++++++++++++++++31+++++++++++++++++++++++
bled", "disabled");

                    //noinspection JSUnusedGlobalSymbols
                    $.post("/data/blogAndContest?action=attachBlogToContest", {
                        blogId:"22906", contestId:$("#facebox #blogEntry-55402-contestId").val(),
                        blogEntryId:"55402",
                        resourceType:$("#facebox #blogEntry-55402-resourceType").val()
                    }, function (json) {
                        var validated = true;

                        for (var key in json) {
                            if (json.hasOwnProperty(key) && key.indexOf("error__") === 0) {
                                validated = false;
                                $("#facebox .blogEntry-55402-" + key.substring("error__".length) + "-error").show();
                                $("#facebox .for__blogEntry-55402-" + key.substring("error__".length)).text(json[key]);
                            }
                        }

                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55402-resource-submitting-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55402-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        if (validated) {
                            $.facebox.close();
                            if (json["success"] === "true") {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("Blog has been successfully attached to selected contest");
                            } else {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("There is unexpected error while attaching blog to the contest");
                            }
                        }
                    }, "json");
                }

                return false;
            });

            var contestSelect = $("#blogEntry-55402-contestId");
            var popupContestSelect = $("#facebox #blogEntry-55402-contestId");

            if (popupContestSelect.is(":disabled")) {
                $.post("/data/contests?action=getContestListWithEditableResources",
++++++++++++++++++32+++++++++++++++++++++++
 function (data) {
                    if (data["result"] === "success") {
                        var contests = data["contests"];

                        for (var i = 0, contestCount = contests.length; i < contestCount; ++i) {
                            //noinspection StringLiteralBreaksHTMLJS
                            var contestOptionHtml = "<option value=\"" + contests[i]["id"] + "\">"
                                    + contests[i]["id"] + " - " + contests[i]["name"] + "</option>";
                            contestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                            popupContestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                        }

                        contestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#blogEntry-55402-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#blogEntry-55402-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        popupContestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55402-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55402-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");
                    } else {
                        alert("Can't receive contest list");
                    }
                }, "json");
            }

            return false;
        });
    });
</script>



        <span style="position:absolute;right:0;top:0.05em;margin-right:1em;display:inline;font-size:0.75em;">
            <div style="margin-top:0.25em;">
            </div>
        </span>
    </div>

    <div class="content">
        <div class="ttypography"><p>Hello everybody!</p><p>Round 443 will start on Thursday, <a href="https://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?msg=Codeforces+Round+443&amp;iso=20171026T1735&amp;p1=166&amp;ah=2">26 October in 17:35 MSK</a>.</p><p>Tasks are prepared by me, Konstantin Khadaev. It's my first round on Codeforces. Thanks to <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/zemen" title="Inte
++++++++++++++++++33+++++++++++++++++++++++
rnational Grandmaster zemen">zemen</a>, <a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/AlexFetisov" title="Candidate Master AlexFetisov">AlexFetisov</a>, <a class="rated-user user-legendary" href="/profile/vepifanov" title="Legendary grandmaster vepifanov"><span class="legendary-user-first-letter">v</span>epifanov</a>, and <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/Belonogov" title="International Grandmaster Belonogov">Belonogov</a> for testing problems,  <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/KAN" title="Grandmaster KAN">KAN</a> for coordination, and <a class="rated-user user-admin" href="/profile/MikeMirzayanov" title="Headquarters, MikeMirzayanov">MikeMirzayanov</a> for this site and the Polygon platform.</p><p>Both divisions will have five problems to solve in two hours.</p><p>Scoring: in Div 1: 500 — <strong>1250</strong> — <strong>1250</strong> — 2000 — 2500, in Div 2: 500 — 1000 — 1500 — <strong>2250</strong> — <strong>2250</strong></p><p>Good luck to all!</p><p><strong>UPD1</strong>: Congrats to the winners!</p><p>Div 1:</p> <ol>   <li><a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/dotorya" <script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $(".blogEntry-55324-error").hide();

        $(".attach-blogEntry-55324-to-contest-link").click(function () {
            Codeforces.facebox(".attach-blogEntry-55324-to-contest-form-holder", "http://st.codeforces.com/s/81047");

            $("#facebox .attach-blogEntry-55324-to-contest-form").submit(function () {
                if ($(this).find(":disabled").length === 0) {
                    $("#facebox .blogEntry-55324-error").hide();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-55324-resource-submitting-indicator").show();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-55324-resource-submit").attr("disabled", "disabled");

                    //noinspection JSUnusedGlobalSymbols
                    $.post("/data/blogAndContest?action=attachBlogToContest", {
                        blogId:"57814", contestId:$("#facebox #blogEntry-55324-contestId").val(),
                        blogEntryId:"55324",
                        resourceType:$("#facebox #blogEntry-55324-resourceType").val()
                    }, function (json) {
                        var validated = true;

                        for (var key in json) {
                            if 
++++++++++++++++++39+++++++++++++++++++++++
(json.hasOwnProperty(key) && key.indexOf("error__") === 0) {
                                validated = false;
                                $("#facebox .blogEntry-55324-" + key.substring("error__".length) + "-error").show();
                                $("#facebox .for__blogEntry-55324-" + key.substring("error__".length)).text(json[key]);
                            }
                        }

                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55324-resource-submitting-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55324-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        if (validated) {
                            $.facebox.close();
                            if (json["success"] === "true") {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("Blog has been successfully attached to selected contest");
                            } else {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("There is unexpected error while attaching blog to the contest");
                            }
                        }
                    }, "json");
                }

                return false;
            });

            var contestSelect = $("#blogEntry-55324-contestId");
            var popupContestSelect = $("#facebox #blogEntry-55324-contestId");

            if (popupContestSelect.is(":disabled")) {
                $.post("/data/contests?action=getContestListWithEditableResources", function (data) {
                    if (data["result"] === "success") {
                        var contests = data["contests"];

                        for (var i = 0, contestCount = contests.length; i < contestCount; ++i) {
                            //noinspection StringLiteralBreaksHTMLJS
                            var contestOptionHtml = "<option value=\"" + contests[i]["id"] + "\">"
                                    + contests[i]["id"] + " - " + contests[i]["name"] + "</option>";
                            contestSelect.append(contestOpt
++++++++++++++++++40+++++++++++++++++++++++
ionHtml);
                            popupContestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                        }

                        contestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#blogEntry-55324-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#blogEntry-55324-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        popupContestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55324-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55324-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");
                    } else {
                        alert("Can't receive contest list");
                    }
                }, "json");
            }

            return false;
        });
    });
</script>



        <span style="position:absolute;right:0;top:0.05em;margin-right:1em;display:inline;font-size:0.75em;">
            <div style="margin-top:0.25em;">

    </div>

    <div class="content">
        <div class="ttypography"><p>Hi, Codeforces!</p><p><a href="https://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?msg=Codeforces+Round+%23442+%28Div.+2%29&amp;iso=20171023T1835&amp;p1=166&amp;ah=2">On monday, October 23rd, at 18:35 MSK</a> rated Div. 2 round will be held. Participants from first division can take part out of competition.</p><p>The problems for this round were prepared by me. Thanks to Daniil (<a class="rated-user user-orange" href="/profile/qoo2p5" title="Master qoo2p5">qoo2p5</a>) Nikolenko, Nikita (<a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/neckbosov" title="Candidate Master neckbosov">neckbosov</a>) Bosov, Alexander (<a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/Alladdin" title="Candidate Master Alladdin">Alladdin</a>) Proskurin, AmirReza (<a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/Arpa" title="Candidate Master Arpa">Arpa</a>) PoorAkhavan, Ildar (<a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/gainullin.ildar" title="Grandmast
++++++++++++++++++41+++++++++++++++++++++++
er gainullin.ildar">gainullin.ildar</a>) Gainullin, Alexey (<a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/ashmelev" title="Grandmaster ashmelev">ashmelev</a>) Shmelev for help in preparations and testing problems, Ann Izyumova for help with translation, Nikolay (<a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/KAN" title="Grandmaster KAN">KAN</a>) Kalinin for the round coordination and Mike (<a class="rated-user user-admin" href="/profile/MikeMirzayanov" title="Headquarters, MikeMirzayanov">MikeMirzayanov</a>) Mirzayanov for amazing platforms Codeforces and Polygon.</p><p>You will have 2 hours for 6 problems.</p><p>Hope you will enjoy problems! Good luck!</p><p><strong>Upd1</strong>: <a href="http://codeforces.com/blog/entry/55362">Editorial</a></p><p><strong>Upd2</strong>: Congratulation to winners!</p><h3>Div1</h3> <ol>   <li><a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/Farhod_Farmon" title="Candidate Master Farhod_Farmon">Farhod_Farmon</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/Gritukan" title="International Grandmaster Gritukan">Gritukan</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/KrK" title="International Grandmaster KrK">KrK</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/rajat1603" title="Grandmaster rajat1603">rajat1603</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-orange" href="/profile/chemthan" title="Master chemthan">chemthan</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/I_love_Maria_Ivanova" title="Candidate Master I_love_Maria_Ivanova">I_love_Maria_Ivanova</a></li> </ol><h3>Div2</h3> <ol>   <li><a class="rated-user user-black" href="/profile/I_want_au" title="Unrated, I_want_au">I_want_au</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-cyan" href="/profile/GTMD_UESTCACM" title="Specialist GTMD_UESTCACM">GTMD_UESTCACM</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/SORONGON" title="Expert SORONGON">SORONGON</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/Sheng_D_Bao" title="Expert Sheng_D_Bao">Sheng_D_Bao</a></li>   <l

<script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $(".blogEntry-55296-error").hide();

        $(".attach-blogEntry-55296-to-contest-link").click(function () {
            Codeforces.facebox(".attach-blogEntry-55296-to-contest-form-holder", "http://st.codeforces.com/s/81047");

            $("#facebox .attach-blogEntry-55296-to-contest-form").submit(function () {
                if ($(this).find(":disabled").length === 0) {
                    $("#facebox .blogEntry-55296-error").hide();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-55296-resource-submitting-indicator").show();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-55296-resource-submit").attr("disabled", "disabled");

                    //noinspection JSUnusedGlobalSymbols
                    $.post("/data/blogAndContest?action=attachBlogToContest", {
                        blogId:"1", contestId:$("#facebox #blogEntry-55296-contestId").val(),
                        blogEntryId:"55296",
                        resourceType:$("#facebox #blogEntry-55296-resourceType").val()
++++++++++++++++++47+++++++++++++++++++++++

                    }, function (json) {
                        var validated = true;

                        for (var key in json) {
                            if (json.hasOwnProperty(key) && key.indexOf("error__") === 0) {
                                validated = false;
                                $("#facebox .blogEntry-55296-" + key.substring("error__".length) + "-error").show();
                                $("#facebox .for__blogEntry-55296-" + key.substring("error__".length)).text(json[key]);
                            }
                        }

                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55296-resource-submitting-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55296-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        if (validated) {
                            $.facebox.close();
                            if (json["success"] === "true") {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("Blog has been successfully attached to selected contest");
                            } else {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("There is unexpected error while attaching blog to the contest");
                            }
                        }
                    }, "json");
                }

                return false;
            });

            var contestSelect = $("#blogEntry-55296-contestId");
            var popupContestSelect = $("#facebox #blogEntry-55296-contestId");

            if (popupContestSelect.is(":disabled")) {
                $.post("/data/contests?action=getContestListWithEditableResources", function (data) {
                    if (data["result"] === "success") {
                        var contests = data["contests"];

                        for (var i = 0, contestCount = contests.length; i < contestCount; ++i) {
                            //noinspection StringLiteralBreaksHTMLJS
                            var contestOptionHtml = "<option value=\"" + contests[i]["id
++++++++++++++++++48+++++++++++++++++++++++
"] + "\">"
                                    + contests[i]["id"] + " - " + contests[i]["name"] + "</option>";
                            contestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                            popupContestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                        }

                        contestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#blogEntry-55296-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#blogEntry-55296-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        popupContestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55296-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55296-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");
                    } else {
                        alert("Can't receive contest list");
                    }
                }, "json");
            }

            return false;
        });
    });
</script>



        <span style="position:absolute;right:0;top:0.05em;margin-right:1em;display:inline;font-size:0.75em;">
            <div style="margin-top:0.25em;">
            </div>
        </span>
    </div>

    <div class="content">
        <div class="ttypography"><p>Hello!</p><p>ACM-ICPC Southern Subregional Contest (NEERC/Northern Eurasia) 2017 has ended on October 18. There were 73 teams onsite in Saratov, most of them were invited because of their result on <a href="https://icpc.sgu.ru/">the qualification stage</a>.</p><p>On <a href="http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?day=21&amp;month=10&amp;year=2017&amp;hour=11&amp;min=5&amp;sec=0&amp;p1=166">Saturday, October 21, 08:05 (UTC)</a> will start online-mirror <a href="/contest/883" title="2017-2018 ACM-ICPC, NEERC, Southern Subregional Contest (Online Mirror, ACM-ICPC Rules, Teams Preferred)">2017-2018 ACM-ICPC, NEERC, Southern Subregional Contest (Online Mirror, ACM-ICPC Rules, Teams Preferred)</a>.</p><p>I invite ACM-ICPC teams and individual participan
++++++++++++++++++49+++++++++++++++++++++++
ts of Codeforces competitions to take part! Sure, the contest will be unrated.</p><p><a class="rated-user user-admin" href="/profile/MikeMirzayanov" title="Headquarters, MikeMirzayanov">MikeMirzayanov</a></p></div><p><a href="/blog/entry/55296">Read more »</a></p>
    </div>

        $(document).ready(function () {
    $(".topic-vote-up-55570").click(function () {
        $.post("/data/topic/vote", {topicId: 55570, _tta: Codeforces.tta(), topicRevisionId: 128229, vote: +1}, function(data) {
            Codeforces.showMessage(data);
        }, "json");
        return false;
    });
    $(".topic-vote-down-55570").click(function () {
        $.post("/data/topic/vote", {topicId: 55570, _tta: Codeforces.tta(), topicRevisionId: 128229, vote: -1}, function(data) {
            Codeforces.showMessage(data);
        }, "json");
        return false;
    });
        });

<script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $(".blogEntry-55201-error").hide();

        $(".attach-blogEntry-55201-to-contest-link").click(function () {
            Codeforces.facebox(".attach-blogEntry-55201-to-contest-form-holder", "http://st.codeforces.com/s/81047");

            $("#facebox .attach-blogEntry-55201-to-contest-form").submit(function () {
                if ($(this).find(":disabled").length === 0) {
                    $("#facebox .blogEntry-55201-error").hide();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-55201-resource-submitting-indicator").show();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-55201-resource-submit").attr("disabled", "disabled");

                    //noinspection JSUnusedGlobalSymbols
                    $.post("/data/blogAndContest?action=attachBlogToContest", {
                        blogId:"1555", contestId:$("#facebox #blogEntry-55201-contestId").val(),
                        blogEntryId:"55201",
                        resourceType:$("#facebox #blogEntry-55201-resourceType").val(
++++++++++++++++++54+++++++++++++++++++++++
)
                    }, function (json) {
                        var validated = true;

                        for (var key in json) {
                            if (json.hasOwnProperty(key) && key.indexOf("error__") === 0) {
                                validated = false;
                                $("#facebox .blogEntry-55201-" + key.substring("error__".length) + "-error").show();
                                $("#facebox .for__blogEntry-55201-" + key.substring("error__".length)).text(json[key]);
                            }
                        }

                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55201-resource-submitting-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55201-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        if (validated) {
                            $.facebox.close();
                            if (json["success"] === "true") {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("Blog has been successfully attached to selected contest");
                            } else {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("There is unexpected error while attaching blog to the contest");
                            }
                        }
                    }, "json");
                }

                return false;
            });

            var contestSelect = $("#blogEntry-55201-contestId");
            var popupContestSelect = $("#facebox #blogEntry-55201-contestId");

            if (popupContestSelect.is(":disabled")) {
                $.post("/data/contests?action=getContestListWithEditableResources", function (data) {
                    if (data["result"] === "success") {
                        var contests = data["contests"];

                        for (var i = 0, contestCount = contests.length; i < contestCount; ++i) {
                            //noinspection StringLiteralBreaksHTMLJS
                            var contestOptionHtml = "<option value=\"" + contests[i]["i
++++++++++++++++++55+++++++++++++++++++++++
d"] + "\">"
                                    + contests[i]["id"] + " - " + contests[i]["name"] + "</option>";
                            contestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                            popupContestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                        }

                        contestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#blogEntry-55201-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#blogEntry-55201-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        popupContestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55201-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55201-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");
                    } else {
                        alert("Can't receive contest list");
                    }
                }, "json");
            }

            return false;
        });
    });
</script>



        <span style="position:absolute;right:0;top:0.05em;margin-right:1em;display:inline;font-size:0.75em;">
            <div style="margin-top:0.25em;">
            </div>
        </span>
    </div>

    <div class="content">
        <div class="ttypography"><p>Hi everybody,</p><p>Lasts Sunday there was a 15th <a href="http://olympiads.ru/team">Moscow Team Olympiad</a>, high school students competition based in Moscow that is an elimination contest for All-Russian Team Olympiad. This contest is prepared by Moscow Olympiad Scientific Committee that you may know by Moscow Open Olympiad, Moscow Olympiad for Young Students and Megapolises Olympiad (rounds <a href="http://codeforces.com/blog/entry/21185">327</a>, <a href="http://codeforces.com/blog/entry/23309">342</a>, <a href="http://codeforces.com/blog/entry/43615">345</a>, <a href="http://codeforces.com/blog/entry/47769">376</a>, <a href="http://codeforces.com/blog/entry/50613">401</a>, <a href="http://codeforces.com/blog/entry/54350">433</a>). </p><p>Round will be he
++++++++++++++++++56+++++++++++++++++++++++
ld at <a href="http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?day=16&amp;month=10&amp;year=2017&amp;hour=14&amp;min=5&amp;sec=0&amp;p1=166">11:05 UTC on Monday</a> and will last for 2 hours. Each division will consist of 6 problems.</p><p>Problems are prepared <a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/Andreikkaa" title="Candidate Master Andreikkaa">Andreikkaa</a>, <a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/sender" title="Expert sender">sender</a>, <a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/Flyrise" title="Candidate Master Flyrise">Flyrise</a>, <a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/-__-" title="Candidate Master -__-">-__-</a>, <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/kraskevich" title="International Grandmaster kraskevich">kraskevich</a>, <a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/wilwell" title="Expert wilwell">wilwell</a> under supervision of your humble servant with great help of <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/GlebsHP" title="International Grandmaster GlebsHP">GlebsHP</a>, <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/_meshanya_" title="Grandmaster _meshanya_">_meshanya_</a>, <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/Endagorion" title="International Grandmaster Endagorion">Endagorion</a> and Helen Andreeva.</p><p><strong>Discussing problems with anybody who was a participant of Moscow Team Olympiad is strictly prohibited and may be a reason for disqualification.</strong></p><p>Good luck everybody!</p><p><strong>UPD</strong>: Thanks everybody for participation, congratulations to round winner!</p><p>Div1 winners:</p> <ol>   <li><a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/fateice" title="International Grandmaster fateice">fateice</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/simonlindholm" title="International Grandmaster simonlindholm">simonlindholm</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/Haghani" title="Grandmaster Haghani">Haghani</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/yjq_naive" title="Gra
++++++++++++++++++57+++++++++++++++++++++++
ndmaster yjq_naive">yjq_naive</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-legendary" href="/profile/Petr" title="Legendary grandmaster Petr"><span class="legendary-user-first-letter">P</span>etr</a></li> </ol><p>Div2 winners:</p> <ol>   <li><a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/Cypi" title="Expert Cypi">Cypi</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/Nu11" title="Expert Nu11">Nu11</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/ZJT_IOI_2020_AK" title="Expert ZJT_IOI_2020_AK">ZJT_IOI_2020_AK</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/guoxingzhuo" title="Expert guoxingzhuo">guoxingzhuo</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/Senji" title="Expert Senji">Senji</a></li> </ol><p>Editorial will be published today after a while.</p><p><strong>UPD2</strong>: <a href="/blog/entry/55233">Editorial</a>!</p></div><p><a href="/blog/entry/55201">Read more »</a></p>
    </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $(".blogEntry-55167-error").hide();

        $(".attach-blogEntry-55167-to-contest-link").click(function () {
            Codeforces.facebox(".attach-blogEntry-55167-to-contest-form-holder", "http://st.codeforces.com/s/81047");

            $("#facebox .attach-blogEntry-55167-to-contest-form").submit(function () {
                if ($(this).find(":disabled").length === 0) {
                    $("#facebox .blogEntry-55167-error").hide();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-55167-resource-submitting-indicator").show();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-55167-resource-submit").attr("disabled", "disabled");

                    //noinspection JSUnusedGlobalSymbols
                    $.post("/data/blogAndContest?action=attachBlogToContest", {
                        blogId:"1", contestId:$("#facebox #blogEntry-55167-contestId").val(),
                        blogEntryId:"55167",
                        resourceType:$("#facebox #blogEntry-55167-resourceType").val()
                    }, function (json) {
                        var validated = true;

                        for (var key in json) {
                            if (json.hasOwnProperty(key) && key.indexOf("error__") === 0) {
                                validated = false;
                                $("#facebox .blogEntry-55167-" + key.substring("error__".length) + "-error").show();
                                $("#facebox .for__blogEntry-55167-" + key.substring("error__".length)).text(json[key]);
                            }
                        }

                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55167-resource-submitting-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55167-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled")
++++++++++++++++++63+++++++++++++++++++++++
;

                        if (validated) {
                            $.facebox.close();
                            if (json["success"] === "true") {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("Blog has been successfully attached to selected contest");
                            } else {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("There is unexpected error while attaching blog to the contest");
                            }
                        }
                    }, "json");
                }

                return false;
            });

            var contestSelect = $("#blogEntry-55167-contestId");
            var popupContestSelect = $("#facebox #blogEntry-55167-contestId");

            if (popupContestSelect.is(":disabled")) {
                $.post("/data/contests?action=getContestListWithEditableResources", function (data) {
                    if (data["result"] === "success") {
                        var contests = data["contests"];

                        for (var i = 0, contestCount = contests.length; i < contestCount; ++i) {
                            //noinspection StringLiteralBreaksHTMLJS
                            var contestOptionHtml = "<option value=\"" + contests[i]["id"] + "\">"
                                    + contests[i]["id"] + " - " + contests[i]["name"] + "</option>";
                            contestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                            popupContestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                        }

                        contestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#blogEntry-55167-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#blogEntry-55167-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        popupContestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55167-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55167-resource-submit").removeAttr("disable
++++++++++++++++++64+++++++++++++++++++++++
d");
                    } else {
                        alert("Can't receive contest list");
                    }
                }, "json");
            }

            return false;
        });
    });
</script>

    <div class="content">
        <div class="ttypography"><p>Codeforces Round 440 will start on <a href="http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?day=15&amp;month=10&amp;year=2017&amp;hour=11&amp;min=5&amp;sec=0&amp;p1=166">October 15 (Sunday), 08:05 (UTC)</a>. It will be based on Technocup 2018 Elimination Round 2. So, if you are a Russian-speaking high-school student, please take part in the <a href="https://technocup.mail.ru/">Technocup 2018</a>.</p><p>Codeforces Round 440 is <b>open and rated for everyone</b>.</p><p>Wish you good luck and bugless code.</p><p><a href="http://codeforces.com/blog/entry/55200">Editorial</a> is posted.</p><p>Congratulations to winners!</p><p>Technocup official round:</p> <ol>   <li><a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/Horoshi_chelovek" title="Candidate Master Horoshi_chelovek">Horoshi_chelovek</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/scanhex" title="Candidate Master scanhex">scanhex</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/Krisha" title="Expert Krisha">Krisha</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/ZinchenkoDanil" title="Candidate Master ZinchenkoDanil">ZinchenkoDanil</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/neckbosov" title="Candidate Master neckbosov">neckbosov</a></li> </ol><p>Div. 1:</p> <ol>   <li><a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/khadaev" title="International Grandmaster khadaev">khadaev</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/Errichto" title="International Grandmaster Errichto">Errichto</a></li
++++++++++++++++++65+++++++++++++++++++++++
>   <li><a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/eddy1021" title="International Grandmaster eddy1021">eddy1021</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/FizzyDavid" title="International Grandmaster FizzyDavid">FizzyDavid</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/fateice" title="International Grandmaster fateice">fateice</a></li> </ol><p>Div. 2:</p> <ol>   <li><a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/wdmmsyf" title="Candidate Master wdmmsyf">wdmmsyf</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/oscillation" title="Candidate Master oscillation">oscillation</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/pulkit.kapoor" title="Candidate Master pulkit.kapoor">pulkit.kapoor</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/oscar172772" title="Expert oscar172772">oscar172772</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/OMS" title="Candidate Master OMS">OMS</a></li> </ol></div><p><a href="/blog/entry/55167">Read more »</a></p>

    });
    $(".topic-vote-down-55441").click(function () {
        $.post("/data/topic/vote", {topicId: 55441, _tta: Codeforces.tta(), topicRevisionId: 128037, vote: -1}, function(data) {
            Codeforces.showMessage(data);
        }, "json");
        return false;
    });
        });
    </script>
</div>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $(".blogEntry-55145-error").hide();

        $(".attach-blogEntry-55145-to-contest-link").click(function () {
            Codeforces.facebox(".attach-blogEntry-55145-to-contest-form-holder", "http://st.codeforces.com/s/81047");

            $("#facebox .attach-blogEntry-55145-to-contest-form").submit(function () {
                if ($(this).find(":disabled").length === 0) {
                    $("#facebox .blogEntry-55145-error").hide();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-55145-resource-submitting-indicator").show();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-55145-resource-submit").attr("disabled", "disabled");

                    //noinspection JSUnusedGlobalSymbols
                    $.post("/data/blogAndContest?action=attachBlogToContest", {
                        blogId:"11391", contestId:$("#facebox #blogEntry-55145-contestId").val(),
                        blogEntryId:"55145",
                        resourceType:$("#facebox #blogEntry-55145-resourceType").val()
                    }, function (json) {
                        var validated = true;

                        for (var key in json) {
                            if (json.hasOwnProperty(key) && key.indexOf("error__") === 0) {
                                validated = false;
                                $("#facebox .blogE
++++++++++++++++++71+++++++++++++++++++++++
ntry-55145-" + key.substring("error__".length) + "-error").show();
                                $("#facebox .for__blogEntry-55145-" + key.substring("error__".length)).text(json[key]);
                            }
                        }

                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55145-resource-submitting-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55145-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        if (validated) {
                            $.facebox.close();
                            if (json["success"] === "true") {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("Blog has been successfully attached to selected contest");
                            } else {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("There is unexpected error while attaching blog to the contest");
                            }
                        }
                    }, "json");
                }

                return false;
            });

            var contestSelect = $("#blogEntry-55145-contestId");
            var popupContestSelect = $("#facebox #blogEntry-55145-contestId");

            if (popupContestSelect.is(":disabled")) {
                $.post("/data/contests?action=getContestListWithEditableResources", function (data) {
                    if (data["result"] === "success") {
                        var contests = data["contests"];

                        for (var i = 0, contestCount = contests.length; i < contestCount; ++i) {
                            //noinspection StringLiteralBreaksHTMLJS
                            var contestOptionHtml = "<option value=\"" + contests[i]["id"] + "\">"
                                    + contests[i]["id"] + " - " + contests[i]["name"] + "</option>";
                            contestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                            popupContestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                        }

                        contestSelect.removeAttr(
++++++++++++++++++72+++++++++++++++++++++++
"disabled");
                        $("#blogEntry-55145-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#blogEntry-55145-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        popupContestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55145-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55145-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");
                    } else {
                        alert("Can't receive contest list");
                    }
                }, "json");
            }

            return false;
        });
    });
</script>

    </div>

    <div class="content">
        <div class="ttypography"><p>Hello everyone!</p><p><img alt=" " src="/predownloaded/5b/4f/5b4f9bc2c7dc78fde3b27ca04d19c058b29b4ddb.png" style="max-width: 100.0%;max-height: 100.0%;" /></p><p>From 7 to 16 of November 2017, <a href="https://it-edu.mipt.ru/en/fall_training_2017?utm_source=codeforces&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=workshop"><strong>Moscow International Workshop ACM ICPC 2017</strong></a> is going to be held at MIPT.</p><p>We’d like to remind you that there are only a few days left before the participation cost grows again: if you pay before Oct.16, 2017, the price will be $600. </p><p>What’s more, if you have tight curricula, you can choose a <strong>short</strong> Workshop program which lasts from 9 to 16 of November 2017. Please, pay attention that the <strong>prices</strong> for a short program are also <strong>reduced</strong>.</p><p>Also you can apply for <a href="https://it-edu.mipt.ru/en/online-participation?utm_source=codeforces&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=workshop"><strong>online participation</strong></a> and solve all the contests remotely. </p><p>This time you’ll see some <s
++++++++++++++++++73+++++++++++++++++++++++
trong>new</strong> features:</p><p>1)Sometimes the coaches and ACM-ICPC seniors will be present during the upsolving, so you can ask them questions. <em>(Special thanks to the guys who give us feedback about our Workshops!)</em></p><p>2) There will be organized one lecture for the division A, which will be interesting for the strongest participants.</p><p><img alt=" " src="/predownloaded/0d/3a/0d3acc7199c98e9e2c92306702811702ae8bdd25.png" style="max-width: 100.0%;max-height: 100.0%;" /></p><p>In addition to contests, analyses, and lectures, you’ll enjoy a sightseeing tour in Moscow and events organized by our volunteers! ;) </p></div><p><a href="/blog/entry/55145">Read more »</a></p>

<script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function () {

        $(".attach-blogEntry-55133-to-contest-link").click(function () {
            Codeforces.facebox(".attach-blogEntry-55133-to-contest-form-holder", "http://st.codeforces.com/s/81047");

            $("#facebox .attach-blogEntry-55133-to-contest-form").submit(function () {
                if ($(this).find(":disabled").length === 0) {
                    $("#facebox .blogEntry-55133-error").hide();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-55133-resource-submitting-indicator").show();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-55133-resource-submit").attr("disabled", "disabled");

                        blogId:"42750", contestId:$("#facebox #blogEntry-55133-contestId").val(),
                        blogEntryId:"55133",

                    }, function (json) {
                        var validated = true;

                        for (var key in json) {
                            if (json.hasOwnProperty(key) && key.indexOf("error__") === 0) {
                                validated = false;
                                $("#facebox .blogEntry-55133-" + key.substring("error__".length) + "-error").show();
                                $("#facebox .for__blogEntry-55133-" + key.substring("error__".length)).text(json[key]);
                            }
                        }

    
++++++++++++++++++78+++++++++++++++++++++++
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-55133-resource-submitting-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55133-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        if (validated) {
                            $.facebox.close();
                            if (json["success"] === "true") {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("Blog has been successfully attached to selected contest");
                            } else {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("There is unexpected error while attaching blog to the contest");
                            }
                        }
                    }, "json");
                }

                return false;
            });

            var contestSelect = $("#blogEntry-55133-contestId");
            var popupContestSelect = $("#facebox #blogEntry-55133-contestId");

            if (popupContestSelect.is(":disabled")) {
                $.post("/data/contests?action=getContestListWithEditableResources", function (data) {
                    if (data["result"] === "success") {
                        var contests = data["contests"];

                        for (var i = 0, contestCount = contests.length; i < contestCount; ++i) {
                            //noinspection StringLiteralBreaksHTMLJS
                            var contestOptionHtml = "<option value=\"" + contests[i]["id"] + "\">"
                                    + contests[i]["id"] + " - " + contests[i]["name"] + "</option>";

                        }

                        $("#blogEntry-55133-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#blogEntry-55133-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        popupContestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
++++++++++++++++++79+++++++++++++++++++++++

                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55133-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55133-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");
                    } else {
                        alert("Can't receive contest list");
                    }
                }, "json");
            }

            return false;
        });
    });

        <span style="position:absolute;right:0;top:0.05em;margin-right:1em;display:inline;font-size:0.75em;">
            <div style="margin-top:0.25em;">
            </div>
        </span>
    </div>

    <div class="content">
        <div class="ttypography"><p>Hello Codeforces!</p><p>On <a href="http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?day=12&amp;month=10&amp;year=2017&amp;hour=17&amp;min=5&amp;sec=0&amp;p1=166">October 12, 17:05 MSK</a> Educational Codeforces Round 30 will start.</p><p>Series of Educational Rounds continue being held as <a href="https://harbour.space/">Harbour.Space University</a> initiative! You can read the details about the cooperation between <a href="https://harbour.space/">Harbour.Space University</a> and Codeforces in the <a href="http://codeforces.com/blog/entry/51208">blog post</a>.</p><p>The round will be <strong>unrated</strong> for all users and will be held on extented ACM ICPC rules. After the end of the contest you will have one day to hack any solution you want. You will have access to copy any solution and test it locally.</p><p>You will be given <strong>6 problems</strong> and <strong>2 hours</strong> to solve them.</p><p>The problems were prepared by Ivan <a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/BledDest" title="Candidate Master BledDest">BledDest</a> Androsov, Vladimir <a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/0n25" title="Candidate Master 0n25">0n25</a> Petrov, Mike <a class="rated-user user-admin" href="/profile/MikeMirzayanov" title="Headquarters, MikeMirzayanov">MikeMirzayanov</a> Mirzayanov and me.</p><p>Good luck to all parti
++++++++++++++++++80+++++++++++++++++++++++
cipants!</p><p>Congratulations to the winners: <table>  <tbody>  <tr>  <th>Rank</th>  <th>Competitor</th>  <th>Problems Solved</th>  <th>Penalty</th>  </tr>  <tr>  <td>1</td>  <td><a class="rated-user <script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $(".blogEntry-54971-error").hide();

        $(".attach-blogEntry-54971-to-contest-link").click(function () {
            Codeforces.facebox(".attach-blogEntry-54971-to-contest-form-holder", "http://st.codeforces.com/s/81047");

            $("#facebox .attach-blogEntry-54971-to-contest-form").submit(function () {
                if ($(this).find("
++++++++++++++++++86+++++++++++++++++++++++
:disabled").length === 0) {
                    $("#facebox .blogEntry-54971-error").hide();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-54971-resource-submitting-indicator").show();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-54971-resource-submit").attr("disabled", "disabled");

                    //noinspection JSUnusedGlobalSymbols
                    $.post("/data/blogAndContest?action=attachBlogToContest", {
                        blogId:"83693", contestId:$("#facebox #blogEntry-54971-contestId").val(),
                        blogEntryId:"54971",
                        resourceType:$("#facebox #blogEntry-54971-resourceType").val()
                    }, function (json) {
                        var validated = true;

                        for (var key in json) {
                            if (json.hasOwnProperty(key) && key.indexOf("error__") === 0) {
                                validated = false;
                                $("#facebox .blogEntry-54971-" + key.substring("error__".length) + "-error").show();
                                $("#facebox .for__blogEntry-54971-" + key.substring("error__".length)).text(json[key]);
                            }
                        }

                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-54971-resource-submitting-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-54971-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        if (validated) {
                            $.facebox.close();
                            if (json["success"] === "true") {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("Blog has been successfully attached to selected contest");
                            } else {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("There is unexpected error while attaching blog to the contest");
                            }
                        }
                    }, "json");
                }

                return false;
            });

            var contestS
++++++++++++++++++87+++++++++++++++++++++++
elect = $("#blogEntry-54971-contestId");
            var popupContestSelect = $("#facebox #blogEntry-54971-contestId");

            if (popupContestSelect.is(":disabled")) {
                $.post("/data/contests?action=getContestListWithEditableResources", function (data) {
                    if (data["result"] === "success") {
                        var contests = data["contests"];

                        for (var i = 0, contestCount = contests.length; i < contestCount; ++i) {
                            //noinspection StringLiteralBreaksHTMLJS
                            var contestOptionHtml = "<option value=\"" + contests[i]["id"] + "\">"
                                    + contests[i]["id"] + " - " + contests[i]["name"] + "</option>";
                            contestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                            popupContestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                        }

                        contestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#blogEntry-54971-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#blogEntry-54971-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        popupContestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-54971-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-54971-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");
                    } else {
                        alert("Can't receive contest list");
                    }
                }, "json");
            }

            return false;
        });
    });
</script>



        <span style="position:absolute;right:0;top:0.05em;margin-right:1em;display:inline;font-size:0.75em;">
            <div style="margin-top:0.25em;">
            </div>
        </span>
    </div>

    <div class="content">
        <div class="ttypography"><p>Hi, Codeforces!</p><p>I'm quite excited to invite you to Codeforces Round #439 (Div. 2) which takes place at <a href
++++++++++++++++++88+++++++++++++++++++++++
="https://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?day=06&amp;month=10&amp;year=2017&amp;hour=16&amp;min=35&amp;sec=0&amp;p1=166">16:35 MSK on 6 October</a> and lasts for two hours.</p><p>One of the five problems is created by <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/quailty" title="Grandmaster quailty">quailty</a>, and the others are created by me. This is our first round here. </p><p>The round couldn't have been realized without efforts of <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/KAN" title="Grandmaster KAN">KAN</a> and <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/gritukan" title="International Grandmaster gritukan">gritukan</a>. Besides, I also want to say thanks to our testers: <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/cyand1317" title="Grandmaster cyand1317">cyand1317</a>, <a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/visitWorld" title="Expert visitWorld">visitWorld</a>, <a class="rated-user user-orange" href="/profile/Nisiyama_Suzune" title="Master Nisiyama_Suzune">Nisiyama_Suzune</a>, <a class="rated-user user-orange" href="/profile/cdkrot" title="International master cdkrot">cdkrot</a> and <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/gainullin.ildar" title="Grandmaster gainullin.ildar">gainullin.ildar</a>. Thanks for your help to the contest. Also, thanks to <a class="rated-user user-admin" href="/profile/MikeMirzayanov" title="Headquarters, MikeMirzayanov">MikeMirzayanov</a> with the fantastic Codeforces and Polygon platforms.</p><p>The contest will consist of five problems and it is <strong>rated</strong> for Div. 2 contestants. The same as before, Div. 1 contestants can take part out of competition.</p><p>The problems will feature... <em>Well, let's wait and see</em> for another time ;) As per Codeforces tradition, moderate length text and no spoilers about the actual plot.</p><p>I hope you can have fun during the contest. Good luck and have fun, wish you high rating!</p><p>The scoring distribution will be announced later.</p><p>See you tomorrow!</p><p><strong>UPD1</strong> : The 
++++++++++++++++++89+++++++++++++++++++++++
scoring distribution is 500-1000-1500-2250-2500.</p><p><strong>UPD2</strong> : The contest is over. The <a href="http://codeforces.com/blog/entry/55009">editorial</a> is available.</p><p><strong>UPD3</strong> : Congratulations to top five coders!</p><h3>Division 2 :</h3> <ol>   <li><a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/1heart2plans" title="Expert 1heart2plans">1heart2plans</a> (solved all problems!)</li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-black" href="/profile/fatice" title="Unrated, fatice">fatice</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/LuckyPants" title="Expert LuckyPants">LuckyPants</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/xza" title="Expert xza">xza</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/T404" title="Expert T404">T404</a></li> </ol><h3>Division 1 + Division 2 :</h3> <ol>   <li><a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/1heart2plans" title="Expert 1heart2plans">1heart2plans</a> (solved all problems!)</li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/unused" title="Grandmaster unused">unused</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-black" href="/profile/fatice" title="Unrated, fatice">fatice</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-orange" href="/profile/nuip" title="International master nuip">nuip</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/chemthan" title="Grandmaster chemthan">chemthan</a></li> </ol><p>Have fun! See you next time! (Let's wait and see...)</p></div><p><a href="/blog/entry/54971">Read more »</a></p>
    </div>

    <div class="title">
            <a href="/blog/entry/54961">            <p>Codeforces Round #438 by 2nd Hello Barcelona Bootcamp with Sberbank</p>

    <div class="info" style="position:relative;">
            By&nbsp;<a href="/profile/Endagorion" title="International Grandmaster Endagorion" class="rated-user user-red">Endagorion</a>,
            <span class="format-humantime" title="Oct/04/2017 19:51">4 weeks ago</span>,
            
++++++++++++++++++92+++++++++++++++++++++++

            <img style="position: relative;top: 5px;" src="http://st.codeforces.com/s/81047/images/flags/24/gb.png" alt="In English" title="In English"/>,

<a class="attach-blogEntry-54961-to-contest-link" href="#"><img src="http://st.codeforces.com/s/81047/images/icons/paperclip-16x16.png" title="Attach this blog to some contest as a resource"/></a>

    }

<div class="attach-blogEntry-54961-to-contest-form-holder" style="display: none;padding: 1em;margin: 1em;">
    <form class="attach-blogEntry-54961-to-contest-form" method="post"><input type='hidden' name='csrf_token' value='a3e76be5043822c8ee5ef427881e3e59'/>
        <table style="width: 100%;">
            <thead>
            </thead>
            <tbody>

<script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $(".blogEntry-54961-error").hide();

        $(".attach-blogEntry-54961-to-contest-link").click(function () {
            Codeforces.facebox(".attach-blogEntry-54961-to-contest-form-holder", "http://st.codeforces.com/s/81047");

            $("#facebox .attach-blogEntry-54961-to-contest-form").submit(function () {
                if ($(this).find(":disabled").length === 0) {
                    $("#facebox .bl
++++++++++++++++++94+++++++++++++++++++++++
ogEntry-54961-error").hide();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-54961-resource-submitting-indicator").show();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-54961-resource-submit").attr("disabled", "disabled");

                    //noinspection JSUnusedGlobalSymbols
                    $.post("/data/blogAndContest?action=attachBlogToContest", {
                        blogId:"989", contestId:$("#facebox #blogEntry-54961-contestId").val(),
                        blogEntryId:"54961",
                        resourceType:$("#facebox #blogEntry-54961-resourceType").val()
                    }, function (json) {
                        var validated = true;

                        for (var key in json) {
                            if (json.hasOwnProperty(key) && key.indexOf("error__") === 0) {
                                validated = false;
                                $("#facebox .blogEntry-54961-" + key.substring("error__".length) + "-error").show();
                                $("#facebox .for__blogEntry-54961-" + key.substring("error__".length)).text(json[key]);
                            }
                        }

                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-54961-resource-submitting-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-54961-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        if (validated) {
                            $.facebox.close();
                            if (json["success"] === "true") {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("Blog has been successfully attached to selected contest");
                            } else {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("There is unexpected error while attaching blog to the contest");
                            }
                        }
                    }, "json");
                }

                return false;
            });

            var contestSelect = $("#blogEntry-54961-contestId");
            var popupCon
++++++++++++++++++95+++++++++++++++++++++++
testSelect = $("#facebox #blogEntry-54961-contestId");

            if (popupContestSelect.is(":disabled")) {
                $.post("/data/contests?action=getContestListWithEditableResources", function (data) {
                    if (data["result"] === "success") {
                        var contests = data["contests"];

                        for (var i = 0, contestCount = contests.length; i < contestCount; ++i) {
                            //noinspection StringLiteralBreaksHTMLJS
                            var contestOptionHtml = "<option value=\"" + contests[i]["id"] + "\">"
                                    + contests[i]["id"] + " - " + contests[i]["name"] + "</option>";
                            contestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                            popupContestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                        }

                        contestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#blogEntry-54961-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#blogEntry-54961-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        popupContestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-54961-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-54961-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");
                    } else {
                        alert("Can't receive contest list");
                    }
                }, "json");
            }

            return false;
        });
    });
</script>

    <div class="content">
        <div class="ttypography"><center> <img src="/predownloaded/d1/0f/d10f26a5c5ba4fa2a31a0b69edc74c7799474e82.png" style="max-width: 100.0%;max-height: 100.0%;" /> </center><p>Hi Codeforces!</p><p>The Codeforces Ro
++++++++++++++++++96+++++++++++++++++++++++
und #438 by Sberbank and Barcelona Bootcamp (Div. 1 + Div. 2 combined) is going to be held on <a href="https://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?msg=The+Codeforces+Round+%23438+by+Sberbank+and+Barcelona+Bootcamp&amp;iso=20171005T0905&amp;p1=31">05 Oct at 9:05 (UTC+2)</a>! The round will be <strong>rated for everyone</strong>.</p><p>This round is organised in collaboration with <a href="http://in.harbour.space/icpc/acm-icpc-hello-barcelona-bootcamp-autumn-2017/?utm_source=Codeforces">2nd Hello Barcelona ACM ICPC Bootcamp 2017</a> and supported by <a href="http://www.sberbank.com/ru">Sberbank</a>, the biggest commercial and investment bank of Central and Eastern Europe, with over 175 years of history.</p><p>150 students from 53 universities, including ITMO, University of New South Wales, St. Petersburg State University, MIPT, Ural Federal University, Tomsk State University, Novosibirsk State University, Saratov State University, Samara National Research, Perm State University, and many other top global universities such as USA’s highest placing team, Central Florida University, along with Canada’s University of Waterloo, high-scoring Asian teams from Hangzhou Dianzi and Singapore, and Tokyo University, as well as Stockholm’s KTH, will be competing as individuals for the online round, which includes those of you from Codeforces!</p><p>The past week has been full of intense competitions, job interviews with <a href="http://www.sberbank.com/ru">Sberbank</a>, and contest analysis and lectures by Andrey Stankevich (<a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/Andrewzta" title="Grandmaster Andrewzta">Andrewzta</a>), Mike Mirzayanov (<a class="rated-user user-admin" href="/profile/MikeMirzayanov" title="Headquarters, MikeMirzayanov">MikeMirzayanov</a>), Gleb Evstropov (<a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/GlebsHP" title="International Grandmaster GlebsHP">GlebsHP</a>), Artem Vasilyev (<a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/VArtem" title="Grandmaster VArtem">VArtem</a>) and Mikhail Tikhom
++++++++++++++++++97+++++++++++++++++++++++
irov (<a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/Endagorion" title="International Grandmaster Endagorion">Endagorion</a>).</p><p><iframe allowfullscreen="" frameborder="0" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/zE2BF9XlNgg" width="560"></iframe></p><p>The event is completely international, as teams from all parts of the globe compete and practice side-by-side.     <script type="text/javascript">
        $(document).ready(function () {
function handlePaginationKeyboardEvent(right) {
    var pageIndex = parseInt($(".pagination").find("span.active").attr("pageIndex"));
    if (right) {
        pageIndex++;
    } else {
        pageIndex--;
    }
    $(".pagination").find("span[pageIndex=" + pageIndex + "]").each(function () {
        Codeforces.redirect($(this).find("a").attr("href"));
    });
}
$(document).keydown(function (e) {
     var code = (e.keyCode ? e.keyCode : e.which);
     if (e.ctrlKey) {
        if (code == 37 || code == 39) {
            handlePaginationKeyboardEvent(code == 39);
        }
     }
});
        });
    </script>                </div>

            $(function() {
                $(".switchToMobile").click(function() {
                    Codeforces.redirect(Codeforces.updateUrlParameter(document.location.href, "mobile", "true"));
                    return false;
                });
                $(".switchToDesktop").click(function() {
                    Codeforces.redirect(Codeforces.updateUrlParameter(document.location.href, "mobile", "false"));
                    return false;
                });

    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(document).ready(function () {
            if ($(window).width() < 1600) {
                $('.button-up').css('width', '30px').css('line-height', '30px').css('font-size', '20px');
            }

            if ($(window).width() >= 1200) {
                $ (window).scroll (function () {
                    if ($ (this).scrollTop () > 100) {
                        $ ('.button-up').fadeIn();
                    } else {
                        $ ('.button-up').fadeOut();
                    }
                });

                $('.button-up').click(function () {
                    $('body,html').animate({
                        scrollTop: 0
                    }, 500);
                    return false;
                });

                $('.button-up').hover(function () {
                    $(this).animate({
                        'opacity':'1'
                    }).css({'background-color':'#e7ebf0','color':'#6a86a4'});
                }, funct
++++++++++++++++++104+++++++++++++++++++++++
ion () {
                    $(this).animate({
                        'opacity':'0.7'
                    }).css({'background':'none','color':'#d3dbe4'});;
                });
            }
            Codeforces.focusOnError();
        });
    </script>

                    <tbody>
                    </tbody>
            </table>
