    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(document).ready(function () {
                // Cre
++++++++++++++++++105+++++++++++++++++++++++
ate new ':containsIgnoreCase' selector for search
                jQuery.expr[':'].containsIgnoreCase = function(a, i, m) {
                    return jQuery(a).text().toUpperCase()
                            .indexOf(m[3].toUpperCase()) >= 0;
                };

                if (window.updateDatatableFilter == undefined) {
                    window.updateDatatableFilter = function(i) {
                        var parent = $(i).parent().parent().parent().parent();
                        $("tr.no-items", parent).remove();
                        $("tr", parent).hide().removeClass('visible');
                        var text = $(i).val();
                        if (text) {
                            $("tr" + ":containsIgnoreCase('" + text + "')", parent).show().addClass('visible');
                        } else {
                            parent.find(".rowCount").text("");
                            $("tr", parent).show().addClass('visible');
                        }

                        var found = false;
                        var visibleRowCount = 0;
                        $("tr", parent).each(function () {
                            if (!found) {
                                if ($(this).find("th").size() > 0) {
                                    $(this).show().addClass('visible');
                                    found = true;
                                }
                            }
                            if ($(this).hasClass('visible')) {
                                visibleRowCount++;
                            }
                        });
                        if (text) {
                            parent.find(".rowCount").text("Matches: " + (visibleRowCount - (found ? 1 : 0)));
                        }
                        if (visibleRowCount == (found ? 1 : 0)) {
                            $("<tr class='no-items visible'><td style=\"text-align:left;\"colspan=\"32\">No items<\/td><\/tr>").appendTo($(parent).find('table')
++++++++++++++++++106+++++++++++++++++++++++
);
                        }
                        $(parent).find("tr td").removeClass("dark");
                        $(parent).find("tr.visible:odd td").addClass("dark");
                    }

                    $(".datatable .closed").click(function () {
                        var parent = $(this).parent();
                        $(this).hide();
                        $(".filter", parent).fadeIn(function () {
                            $("input", parent).val("").focus().css("border", "1px solid #aaa");
                        });
                    });

                    $(".datatable .opened").click(function () {
                        var parent = $(this).parent().parent();
                        $(".filter", parent).fadeOut(function () {
                            $(".closed", parent).show();
                            $("input", parent).val("").each(function () {
                                window.updateDatatableFilter(this);
                            });
                        });
                    });

                    $(".datatable .filter input").keyup(function(e) {
                        window.updateDatatableFilter(this);
                        e.preventDefault();
                        e.stopPropagation();
                    });

                    $(".datatable table").each(function () {
                        var found = false;
                        $("tr", this).each(function () {
                            if (!found && $(this).find("th").size() == 0) {
                                found = true;
                            }
                        });
                        if (!found) {
                            $("<tr class='no-items visible'><td style=\"text-align:left;\"colspan=\"32\">No items<\/td><\/tr>").appendTo(this);
                        }
                    });

                    // Applies styles to datatables.
                    $(".datatable").each(function () {
                        $(
++++++++++++++++++107+++++++++++++++++++++++
this).find("tr:first th").addClass("top");
                        $(this).find("tr:last td").addClass("bottom");
                        $(this).find("tr:odd td").addClass("dark");
                        $(this).find("tr td:first-child, tr th:first-child").addClass("left");
                        $(this).find("tr td:last-child, tr th:last-child").addClass("right");
                    });

                    $(".datatable table.tablesorter").each(function () {
                        $(this).bind("sortEnd", function () {
                            $(".datatable").each(function () {
                                $(this).find("th, td")
                                    .removeClass("top").removeClass("bottom")
                                    .removeClass("left").removeClass("right")
                                    .removeClass("dark");
                                $(this).find("tr:first th").addClass("top");
                                $(this).find("tr:last td").addClass("bottom");
                                $(this).find("tr:odd td").addClass("dark");
                                $(this).find("tr td:first-child, tr th:first-child").addClass("left");
                                $(this).find("tr td:last-child, tr th:last-child").addClass("right");
                            });
                        });
                    });
                }
        });
    </script>

<script>
// If we have Navigation Timing, make everything relative to navigationStart. Ow, get a time value as early as possible.
var t_start = (window.performance ? Math.round(performance.timing.navigationStart) : new Date().getTime());
var t_image, t_after_image;

function send_beacon() {
var t_onload_handler = t_image - t_start;
var t_inline_script = t_after_image - t_start;
var t_custom_metric = Math.max(t_onload_handler, t_inline_script);

(new Image()).src = "//beacon.marathon.mesos.vn/?site=" + window.location.hostname + "&time=" + t_custom_metric + "ms";
}

if (window.addEventListener) { // W3C standard
window.addEventListener('load', send_beacon, false);
}
else if (window.attachEvent) { // Microsoft
window.attachEvent('onload', send_beacon);
}
</script>

<h2 class="gfnp-title"><a href="/review-tinh-nang-face-id-hoat-dong-on-dinh-ke-ca-trong-dieu-kien-thieu-sang-nhung-lai-gap-van-de-duoi-anh-sang-manh-20171101120223852.chn" title="Review t&#237;nh năng Face ID: Hoạt động ổn định kể cả trong điều kiện thiếu s&#225;ng, nhưng lại gặp vấn đề dưới &#225;nh s&#225;ng mạnh" data-linktype="newsdetail" data-id="20171101120223852">Review tính năng Face ID: Hoạt động ổn định kể cả trong điều kiện thiếu sáng, nhưng l
++++++++++++++++++8+++++++++++++++++++++++
i gặp vấn đề dưới ánh sáng mạnh</a></h2>
<p class="klwfnl-sapo">Nếu vì một lý do nào đó mà Face ID không hoạt động, thì hẳn là bạn đã cầm điện thoại sai cách mất rồi.</p>

        (function () {
            try {
                //check session on client
                if (typeof (Storage) !== "undefined") {
                    var session = sessionStorage.getItem("VisitSession");
                    if (session == null) {
                        //phien lam viec moi
                        sessionStorage.setItem("VisitSession", "1");

                        var hash = window.location.hash;
                        if (hash == "#first") {
                            //link được redirect từ bản mobile sang thì clear hash.
                            window.history.replaceState("", "", window.location.href.split('#')[0]);
                        }
                        else {
                            //nếu không phải link đá từ mobile thì remove cookie ở đây.
                            var setCookie = function (a, c, f) {
                                var e = new Date();
                                e.setTime(e.getTime() + (f * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
                                var b = "expires=" + e.toUTCString();
                                document.cookie = a + "=" + c + "; " + b;
                            };
                            setCookie("browser", "", -1);
                            //reload lại trang để hệ thống chuyển về bản mobile.
                            if (navigator.userAgent.match(/(iPhone|iPod|iPad|Android|BlackBerry|Windows Phone|webOS)/i) != null) {
                                window.location = window.location.href;
                            }

                }
            }
            catch (e) {
                console.log("Lỗi check mobile redirect: " + e);
            }
        })();

<script type="text/lazyscript">

    $('[data-elementtype=searchbuttonv2]').click(function () {
        var strSearch = $('[data-elementtype=searchtextv2]').val();
        strSearch=convertHtmlToText(strSearch);
        strSearch = encodeURIComponent(strSearch);
        if (strSearch != '') {
            var url = String.format("/tim-kiem.htm?keywords={0}", strSearch);
            if (document.all) {
                window.location.href = url;
            } else {
                document.location.href = url;
            }
        } else {
            $('[data-elementtype=searchtextv2]').focus();
        }
        return false;
    });

    $('[data-elementtype=searchtextv2]').keypress(function (event) {
        var key;
        if (window.event) {
            key = window.event.keyCode;
        } else {
            key = event.which;
        }
        if (key == 13) {
            $('[data-elementtype=searchbuttonv2]').click();
            return false;
     
++++++++++++++++++7+++++++++++++++++++++++
   }
    });
    $("#searchbox").removeClass('hidden').show();    
</script>

++++++++++++++++++24+++++++++++++++++++++++
e-qua-doi-nam-sinh-mang-benh-tim-mot-minh-nuoi-em-20171101062912013.htm" title="Kh&#244;ng c&#243; cha, mẹ qua đời, nam sinh mang bệnh tim một m&#236;nh nu&#244;i em" class="fon6" data-newstype="0"  data-linktype="newsdetail"   data-id="20171101062912013"  >Không có cha, mẹ qua đời, nam sinh mang bệnh tim một mình nuôi em</a></h4><div class="sapo fon5">(Dân trí) - Nam cũng không biết cha mình là ai, mà cậu cũng không muốn biết người đàn ông phụ bạc ấy. Cậu lớn lên trong vòng tay yêu thương của mẹ nhưng rồi mẹ cũng đột ngột qua đời, để lại cho Nam đứa em gái cùng mẹ khác cha mới hơn 4 tuổi. Thay mẹ nuôi em, nhưng hiện tại cậu đang mắc bệnh tim chưa có điều kiện chạy chữa.</div><a class="icon-detail fon7" href="/tam-long-nhan-ai/khong-co-cha-me-qua-doi-nam-sinh-mang-benh-tim-mot-minh-nuoi-em-20171101062912013.htm" rel="nofollow">Xem tiếp</a></div>

Thậm chí có một số cửa hàng cho rằng sẽ mua với giá cao trước ngày mở bán, từ 100 đến 200 triệu đồng.<br /><a href="/suc-manh-so/nhieu-cua-hang-chao-ban-iphone-x-gia-40-trieu-dong-nhan-hang-3-11-20171031134256695.htm" title="Nhiều cửa h&#224;ng ch&#224;o b&#225;n iPhone X gi&#225; 40 triệu đồng, nhận h&#224;ng 3/11"><b>&nbsp;&gt;&gt;&nbsp;Nhiều cửa hàng chào bán iPhone X giá 40 triệu đồng, nhận hàng 3/
++++++++++++++++++42+++++++++++++++++++++++
11</b></a><br /><a href="/suc-manh-so/iphone-x-se-co-gia-soc-khi-ve-viet-nam-trong-ngay-dau-tien-20171030135856507.htm" title="iPhone X sẽ c&#243; gi&#225; &quot;sốc&quot; khi về Việt Nam trong ng&#224;y đầu ti&#234;n"><b>&nbsp;&gt;&gt;&nbsp;iPhone X sẽ có giá "sốc" khi về Việt Nam trong ngày đầu tiên</b></a></div><a class="icon-detail fon7" href="/suc-manh-so/rao-gia-iphone-x-200-trieu-dong-truoc-ngay-mo-ban-cung-co-nguoi-mua-20171101161048479.htm" rel="nofollow">Xem tiếp</a></div>

            try {
                //check session on client
                if (typeof (Storage) !== "undefined") {
                    var session = sessionStorage.getItem("VisitSession");
                    if (session == null) {
                        //phien lam viec moi
                        sessionStorage.setItem("VisitSession", "1");

                        var hash = window.location.hash;
                        if (hash == "#first") {
                            //link được redirect từ bản mobile sang thì clear hash.
                            window.history.replaceState("", "", window.location.href.split('#')[0]);
                        }
                        else {
                            //nếu không phải link đá từ mobile thì remove cookie ở đây.
                            var setCookie = function (a, c, f) {
                                var e = new Date();
                                e.setTime(e.getTime() + (f * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
                                var b = "expires=" + e.toUTCString();
                                document.cookie = a + "=" + c + "; " + b;
                            };
                            setCookie("browser", "", -1);
                            //reload lại trang để hệ thống chuyển về bản mobile.
                            if (navigator.userAgent.match(/(iPhone|iPod|iPad|Android|BlackBerry|Windows Phone|webOS)/i) != null) {
                                window.location = window.location.href;

<script type="text/lazyscript">

    $('[data-elementtype=searchbuttonv2]').click(function () {
        var strSearch = $('[data-elementtype=searchtextv2]').val();
        strSearch=convertHtmlToText(strSearch);
        strSearch = encodeURIComponent(strSearch);
        if (strSearch != '') {
            var url = String.format("/tim-kiem.htm?keywords={0}", strSearch);
            if (document.all) {
                window.location.href = url;
            } else {
                document.location.href = url;
            }
        } else {
            $('[data-elementtype=searchtextv2]').focus();
        }
        return false;
    });

    $('[data-elementtype=searchtextv2]').keypress(function (event) {
        var key;
        if (window.event) {
            key = window.event.keyCode;
        } else {
            key = event.which;
        }
        if (key == 13) {
            $('[data-elementtype=searchbuttonv2]').click();
            return false;
     
++++++++++++++++++7+++++++++++++++++++++++
   }
    });
    $("#searchbox").removeClass('hidden').show();    
</script>

        <a  href="/tam-long-nhan-ai/khong-co-cha-me-qua-doi-nam-sinh-mang-benh-tim-mot-minh-nuoi-em-20171101062912013.htm" title="Kh&#244;ng c&#243; cha, mẹ qua đời, nam sinh mang bệnh tim một m&#236;nh nu&#244;i em" ><img   title="Kh&#244;ng c&#243; cha, mẹ qua đời, nam sinh mang bệnh tim một m&#236;nh nu&#244;i em" alt="Kh&#244;ng c&#243; cha, mẹ qua đời, nam sinh mang bệnh tim một m&#236;nh nu&#244;i em" data-x2="https://dantricdn.com/zoom/130_100/2017/em-nam-1-1509347087566-crop-1509347628142.jpg" src="https://dantricdn.com/zoom/130_100/2017/em-nam-1-1509347087566-crop-1509347628142.jpg" width="130" height="100" /></a><div class="fl wid330"><h4><a href="/tam-long-nhan-ai/khong-co-cha-m

e-qua-doi-nam-sinh-mang-benh-tim-mot-minh-nuoi-em-20171101062912013.htm" title="Kh&#244;ng c&#243; cha, mẹ qua đời, nam sinh mang bệnh tim một m&#236;nh nu&#244;i em" class="fon6" data-newstype="0"  data-linktype="newsdetail"   data-id="20171101062912013"  >Không có cha, mẹ qua đời, nam sinh mang bệnh tim một mình nuôi em</a></h4><div class="sapo fon5">(Dân trí) - Nam cũng không biết cha mình là ai, mà cậu cũng không muốn biết người đàn ông phụ bạc ấy. Cậu lớn lên trong vòng tay yêu thương của mẹ nhưng rồi mẹ cũng đột ngột qua đời, để lại cho Nam đứa em gái cùng mẹ khác cha mới hơn 4 tuổi. Thay mẹ nuôi em, nhưng hiện tại cậu đang mắc bệnh tim chưa có điều kiện chạy chữa.</div><a class="icon-detail fon7" href="/tam-long-nhan-ai/khong-co-cha-me-qua-doi-nam-sinh-mang-benh-tim-mot-minh-nuoi-em-20171101062912013.htm" rel="nofollow">Xem tiếp</a></div>
        
    </div>

                _jsCbArr[name] = body;
            },
            exec: function (name, args) {
                if (typeof _jsCbArr[name] == "function") {

                    } catch (e) {
                        return;
                    }
                }

        (function () {
            try {
                //check session on client
                if (typeof (Storage) !== "undefined") {
                    var session = sessionStorage.getItem("VisitSession");
                    if (session == null) {
                        //phien lam viec moi
                        sessionStorage.setItem("VisitSession", "1");

                        var hash = window.location.hash;
                        if (hash == "#first") {
                            //link được redirect từ bản mobile sang thì clear hash.
                            window.history.replaceState("", "", window.location.href.split('#')[0]);
                        }
                        else {
                            //nếu không phải link đá từ mobile thì remove cookie ở đây.
                            var setCookie = function (a, c, f) {
                                var e = new Date();
                                e.setTime(e.getTime() + (f * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
                                var b = "expires=" + e.toUTCString();
                                document.cookie = a + "=" + c + "; " + b;
                            };
                            setCookie("browser", "", -1);
                            //reload lại trang để hệ thống chuyển về bản mobile.
                            if (navigator.userAgent.match(/(iPhone|iPod|iPad|Android|BlackBerry|Windows Phone|webOS)/i) != null) {
                                window.location = window.location.href;
                            }

            }
                    }
                }
            }
            catch (e) {
                console.log("Lỗi check mobile redirect: " + e);
            }
        })();

<script type="text/lazyscript">

    $('[data-elementtype=searchbuttonv2]').click(function () {
        var strSearch = $('[data-elementtype=searchtextv2]').val();
        strSearch=convertHtmlToText(strSearch);
        strSearch = encodeURIComponent(strSearch);
        if (strSearch != '') {
            var url = String.format("/tim-kiem.htm?keywords={0}", strSearch);
            if (document.all) {
                window.location.href = url;
            } else {
                document.location.href = url;
            }
        } else {
            $('[data-elementtype=searchtextv2]').focus();
        }
        return false;
    });

    $('[data-elementtype=searchtextv2]').keypress(function (event) {
        var key;
        if (window.event) {
            key = window.event.keyCode;
        } else {
            key = event.which;
        }
        if (key == 13) {
            $('[data-elementtype=searchbuttonv2]').click();
            return false;
        }
  
++++++++++++++++++7+++++++++++++++++++++++
  });
    $("#searchbox").removeClass('hidden').show();    
</script>

        <a  href="/tam-long-nhan-ai/khong-co-cha-me-qua-doi-nam-sinh-mang-benh-tim-mot-minh-nuoi-em-20171101062912013.htm" title="Kh&#244;ng c&#243; cha, mẹ qua đời, nam sinh mang bệnh tim một m&#236;nh nu&#244;i em" ><img   title="Kh&#244;ng c&#243; cha, mẹ qua đời, nam sinh mang bệnh tim một m&#236;nh nu&#244;i em" alt="Kh&#244;ng c&#243; cha, mẹ qua đời, nam sinh mang bệnh tim một m&#236;nh nu&#244;i em" data-x2="https://dantricdn.com/zoom/130_100/2017/em-nam-1-1509347087566-crop-1509347628142.jpg" src="https://dantricdn.com/zoom/130_100/2017/em-nam-1-1509347087566-crop-1509347628142.jpg" width="130" height="100" /></a><div class="fl wid330"><h4><a href="/tam-long-nhan-ai/khong-co-cha-me-qua-do
++++++++++++++++++24+++++++++++++++++++++++
i-nam-sinh-mang-benh-tim-mot-minh-nuoi-em-20171101062912013.htm" title="Kh&#244;ng c&#243; cha, mẹ qua đời, nam sinh mang bệnh tim một m&#236;nh nu&#244;i em" class="fon6" data-newstype="0"  data-linktype="newsdetail"   data-id="20171101062912013"  >Không có cha, mẹ qua đời, nam sinh mang bệnh tim một mình nuôi em</a></h4><div class="sapo fon5">(Dân trí) - Nam cũng không biết cha mình là ai, mà cậu cũng không muốn biết người đàn ông phụ bạc ấy. Cậu lớn lên trong vòng tay yêu thương của mẹ nhưng rồi mẹ cũng đột ngột qua đời, để lại cho Nam đứa em gái cùng mẹ khác cha mới hơn 4 tuổi. Thay mẹ nuôi em, nhưng hiện tại cậu đang mắc bệnh tim chưa có điều kiện chạy chữa.</div><a class="icon-detail fon7" href="/tam-long-nhan-ai/khong-co-cha-me-qua-doi-nam-sinh-mang-benh-tim-mot-minh-nuoi-em-20171101062912013.htm" rel="nofollow">Xem tiếp</a></div>
        
    </div>

a hậu Đại dương”" data-x2="https://dantricdn.com/zoom/130_100/2017/le-au-ngan-anh-3-crop-1509506778926.jpg" src="https://dantricdn.com/zoom/130_100/2017/le-au-ngan-anh-3-crop-1509506778926.jpg" width="130" height="100" /></a><div class="fl wid330"><h4><a href="/giai-tri/toi-cung-khong-nhan-ra-minh-trong-anh-khi-dang-quang-hoa-hau-dai-duong-20171101103312542.htm" title="“T&#244;i cũng kh&#244;ng nhận ra m&#236;nh trong ảnh khi đăng quang Hoa hậu Đại dương”" class="fon6" data-newstype="0"  data-linktype="newsdetail"   data-id="20171101103312542"  >“Tôi cũng không nhận ra mình trong ảnh khi đăng quang Hoa hậu Đại dương”</a></h4><div class="sapo fon5">(Dân trí) - Lê Âu Ngân Anh chia sẻ việc bị trở thành tâm điểm “chế ảnh” của cư dân mạng sau đăng quang: "Việc bị chỉ trích, nghi ngờ, chế giễu… sau cuộc thi thật sự khiến tôi cảm thấy buồn.                 _jsCbArr[name] = body;
            },
            exec: function (name, args) {
                if (typeof _jsCbArr[name] == "function") {

                        _jsCbArr[name](args);
                    } catch (e) {
                        return;
                    }
                }
            }

        (function () {
            try {
                //check session on client
                if (typeof (Storage) !== "undefined") {
                    var session = sessionStorage.getItem("VisitSession");
                    if (session == null) {
                        //phien lam viec moi
                        sessionStorage.setItem("VisitSession", "1");

                        var hash = window.location.hash;
                        if (hash == "#first") {
                            //link được redirect từ bản mobile sang thì clear hash.
                            window.history.replaceState("", "", window.location.href.split('#')[0]);
                        }
                        else {
                            //nếu không phải link đá từ mobile thì remove cookie ở đây.
                            var setCookie = function (a, c, f) {
                                var e = new Date();
                                e.setTime(e.getTime() + (f * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
                                var b = "expires=" + e.toUTCString();
                                document.cookie = a + "=" + c + "; " + b;
                            };
                            setCookie("browser", "", -1);
                            //reload lại trang để hệ thống chuyển về bản mobile.
                            if (navigator.userAgent.match(/(iPhone|iPod|iPad|Android|BlackBerry|Windows Phone|webOS)/i) != null) {
                                window.location = window.location.href;
                            }

            }
                    }
                }
            }
            catch (e) {
                console.log("Lỗi check mobile redirect: " + e);
            }
        })();

<script type="text/lazyscript">

    $('[data-elementtype=searchbuttonv2]').click(function () {
        var strSearch = $('[data-elementtype=searchtextv2]').val();
        strSearch=convertHtmlToText(strSearch);
        strSearch = encodeURIComponent(strSearch);
        if (strSearch != '') {
            var url = String.format("/tim-kiem.htm?keywords={0}", strSearch);
            if (document.all) {
                window.location.href = url;
            } else {
                document.location.href = url;
            }
        } else {
            $('[data-elementtype=searchtextv2]').focus();
        }
        return false;
    });

    $('[data-elementtype=searchtextv2]').keypress(function (event) {
        var key;
        if (window.event) {
            key = window.event.keyCode;
        } else {
            key = event.which;
        }
        if (key == 13) {
            $('[data-elementtype=searchbuttonv2]').click();
            return false;
     
++++++++++++++++++7+++++++++++++++++++++++
   }
    });
    $("#searchbox").removeClass('hidden').show();    
</script>

    <div class="mt1 clearfix">
        <a  href="/tam-long-nhan-ai/khong-co-cha-me-qua-doi-nam-sinh-mang-benh-tim-mot-minh-nuoi-em-20171101062912013.htm" title="Kh&#244;ng c&#243; cha, mẹ qua đời, nam sinh mang bệnh tim một m&#236;nh nu&#244;i em" ><img   title="Kh&#244;ng c&#243; cha, mẹ qua đời, nam sinh mang bệnh tim một m&#236;nh nu&#244;i em" alt="Kh&#244;ng c&#243; cha, mẹ qua đời, nam sinh mang bệnh tim một m&#236;nh nu&#244;i em" data-x2="https://dantricdn.com/zoom/130_100/2017/em-nam-1-1509347087566-crop-1509347628142.jpg" src="https://dantricdn.com/zoom/130_100/2017/em-nam-1-1509347087566-crop-1509347628142.jpg" width="130" height="100" /></a><div class="fl wid330"><h4><a href="/tam-long-nhan-ai/khong-co-cha-

me-qua-doi-nam-sinh-mang-benh-tim-mot-minh-nuoi-em-20171101062912013.htm" title="Kh&#244;ng c&#243; cha, mẹ qua đời, nam sinh mang bệnh tim một m&#236;nh nu&#244;i em" class="fon6" data-newstype="0"  data-linktype="newsdetail"   data-id="20171101062912013"  >Không có cha, mẹ qua đời, nam sinh mang bệnh tim một mình nuôi em</a></h4><div class="sapo fon5">(Dân trí) - Nam cũng không biết cha mình là ai, mà cậu cũng không muốn biết người đàn ông phụ bạc ấy. Cậu lớn lên trong vòng tay yêu thương của mẹ nhưng rồi mẹ cũng đột ngột qua đời, để lại cho Nam đứa em gái cùng mẹ khác cha mới hơn 4 tuổi. Thay mẹ nuôi em, nhưng hiện tại cậu đang mắc bệnh tim chưa có điều kiện chạy chữa.</div><a class="icon-detail fon7" href="/tam-long-nhan-ai/khong-co-cha-me-qua-doi-nam-sinh-mang-benh-tim-mot-minh-nuoi-em-20171101062912013.htm" rel="nofollow">Xem tiếp</a></div>

oa hậu Đại dương”" data-x2="https://dantricdn.com/zoom/130_100/2017/le-au-ngan-anh-3-crop-1509506778926.jpg" src="https://dantricdn.com/zoom/130_100/2017/le-au-ngan-anh-3-crop-1509506778926.jpg" width="130" height="100" /></a><div class="fl wid330"><h4><a href="/giai-tri/toi-cung-khong-nhan-ra-minh-trong-anh-khi-dang-quang-hoa-hau-dai-duong-20171101103312542.htm" title="“T&#244;i cũng kh&#244;ng nhận ra m&#236;nh trong ảnh khi đăng quang Hoa hậu Đại dương”" class="fon6" data-newstype="0"  data-linktype="newsdetail"   data-id="20171101103312542"  >“Tôi cũng không nhận ra mình trong ảnh khi đăng quang Hoa hậu Đại dương”</a></h4><div class="sapo fon5">(Dân trí) - Lê Âu Ngân Anh chia sẻ việc bị trở thành tâm điểm “chế ảnh” của cư dân mạng sau đăng quang: "Việc bị chỉ trích, nghi ngờ, chế giễu… sau cuộc thi thật sự khiến tôi cảm thấy buồn.     <script type="application/javascript">
        window.standaloneContest = false;
        function adjustViewport() {
            var screenWidthPx = Math.min($(window).width(), window.screen.width);
            var siteWidthPx = 1100; // min width of site
            var ratio = Math.min(screenWidthPx / siteWidthPx, 1.0);
            var viewport = "width=device-width, initial-scale=" + ratio;
            $('#viewport').attr('content', viewport);
            var style = $('<style>html * { max-height: 1000000px; }</style>');
            $('html > head').append(style);
        }

        if ( /Android|webOS|iPhone|iPad|iPod|BlackBerry/i.test(navigator.userAgent) ) {
            adjustViewport();
        }
    </script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var queryMobile = Codeforces.queryString.mobile;
    if (queryMobile === "true" || queryMobile === "false") {
        Codeforces.putToStorage("useMobile", queryMobile == "true");
    } else {
        var useMobile = Codeforces.getFromStorage("useMobile");
        if (useMobile === true || useMobile === false) {
            if (useMobile != false) {
                Codeforces.redirect(Codeforces.updateUrlParameter(document.location.href, "mobile", useMobile));
            }
        }
    }
</script>

    if (window.parent.frames.length > 0) {
        window.stop();
    }
</script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(document).ready(function () {
    (function () {
        jQuery.expr[':'].containsCI = function(elem, index, match) {
            return !match || !match.length || match.length < 4 || !match[3] || (
                    elem.textContent || elem.innerText || jQuery(elem).text() || ''
            ).toLowerCase().indexOf(match[3].toLowerCase()) >= 0;
        }
    }(jQuery));

    $.ajaxPrefilter(function(options, originalOptions, xhr) {
        var csrf = Codeforces.getCsrfToken();

        if (csrf) {
            var data = originalOptions.data;
            if (originalOptions.data !== undefined) {
                if (Object.prototype.toString.call(originalOptions.data) === '[object String]') {
                    data = $.deparam(originalOptions.data);
                }
            } else {
                data = {};
            }
            options.data = $.param($.extend(data, { csrf_token: csrf }));
        }
    });

    window.getCodeforcesServerTime = function(callback) {
        $.post("/data/time", {}, callback, "json");
    }

    window.updateTypography = function () {
        $("div.ttypography code").addClass("tt");
        $("div.ttypography pre>code").addClass("prettyprint").removeClass("tt");
        $("div.ttypography table").addClass("bordertable");
        prettyPrint();
    }

    $.ajaxSetup({ scriptCharset: "utf-8" ,contentType: "application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8", headers: {
        'X-Csrf-Token': Codeforces.getCsrfToken()
    }});

    window.updateTypography();

    Codeforces.signForms();

++++++++++++++++++6+++++++++++++++++++++++

    Codeforces.countdown();

    function showAnnouncements(json) {
        //info("j=" + JSON.stringify(json));

        if (json.t != "a") {
            return;
        }
        // console.log("Got announcement from channel");
        setTimeout(function() {
            Codeforces.showAnnouncements(json.d, "en");
        }, Math.random() * 500);
    }
    if (Codeforces.getParticipantChannel()) {
        Codeforces.subscribe(Codeforces.getParticipantChannel(), function(json) {
            showAnnouncements(json);
        });
    }

    if (Codeforces.getContestChannel()) {
        Codeforces.subscribe(Codeforces.getContestChannel(), function(json) {
            showAnnouncements(json);
        });
    }

    if (Codeforces.getGlobalChannel()) {
        Codeforces.subscribe(Codeforces.getGlobalChannel(), function(json) {
            showAnnouncements(json);
        });
    }

    if (Codeforces.getUserChannel()) {
        Codeforces.subscribe(Codeforces.getUserChannel(), function(json) {
            showAnnouncements(json);
        });
    }

    $(".clickable-title").click(function() {
        Codeforces.alert($(this).attr("title"));
    }).css("position", "relative").css("bottom", "3px");


    Codeforces.reformatTimes();
    Codeforces.initializePubSub();

    Codeforces.setupSpoilers();
    Codeforces.setupTutorials("/data/problemTutorial");
        });
    </script>

        </div>
        <form class="handleForm" method="post"><input type='hidden' name='csrf_token' value='4b978696772969f2c0ebdb6d855a11a8'/>
            <div style="padding:1em;text-align:right;">
                <label style="padding-right:1em;">Handle:
                    <input style="width:12em;" type="text" class="handleBox"/>
                </label>
            </div>
            <div style="padding: 0 1em 1em 1em;text-align:right;">
                <input style="height:1.65em;padding:0 0.75em;" type="submit" value="Find"/>
            </div>
        </form>
    </div>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(document).ready(function () {
    $(".handleBox").autocomplete("/data/handles", {
        delay: 200,
        width: 200,
        selectFirst: false,
        matchContains: true,
        minChars: 3
    });
    $(".handleForm").attr("autocomplete", "off").submit(function () {
        var link = "/profile/userHandle".replace(
            "userHandle", $(this).find(".handleBox").val()
        );
        window.location = link;
        return false;
    });
        });
    </script>

<div class="topic" topicId="55691">
    <div class="title">
            <a href="/blog/entry/55417">            <p>Educational Codeforces Round 31</p>
</a>
    </div>

    <div class="info" style="position:relative;">
            By&nbsp;<a href="/profile/PikMike" title="Candidate Master PikMike" class="rated-user user-violet">PikMike</a>,
                <a href="/topic/55691/en3">history</a>,
            <span class="format-humantime" title="Oct/26/2017 20:51">6 days ago</span>,
            translation,
            <img style="position: relative;top: 5px;" src="http://st.codeforces.com/s/81047/images/flags/24/gb.png" alt="In English" title="In English"/>,

<a class="attach-blogEntry-55417-to-contest-link" href="#"><img src="http://st.codeforces.com/s/81047/images/icons/paperclip-16x16.png" title="Attach this blog to some contest as a resource"/></a>

<script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $(".blogEntry-55417-error").hide();

        $(".attach-blogEntry-55417-to-contest-link").click(function () {
            Codeforces.facebox(".attach-blogEntry-55417-to-contest-form-holder", "http://st.codeforces.com/s/81047");

            $("#facebox .attach-blogEntry-55417-to-contest-form").submit(function () {
                if ($(this).find(":disabled").length === 0) {
                    $("#facebox .blogEntry-55417-error").hide();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-55417-resource-submitting-indicator").show();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-55417-resource-submit").attr("disabled", "disabled");

                    //noinspection JSUnusedGlobalSymbols
                    $.post("/data/blogAndContest?action=attachBlogToContest", {
                        blogId:"42750", contestId:$("#facebox #blogEntry-55417-contestId").val(),
                        blogEntryId:"55417",
                        resourceType:$("#facebox #blogEntry-55417-resourceType").val()
                    }, function (json) {
                        var validated = true;

                        for (var key in json) {
                            if (json.hasOwnProperty(key) && key.indexOf("error__") === 0) {
                                validated = false;
                                $("#facebox .blogEntry-55417-" + key.substring("error__".length) + "-error").show();
                                $("#facebox .for__blogEntry-55417-" + key.substring("error__".length)).text(json[key]);
                            }
                        }

                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55417-resource-submitting-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55417-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        if (validated) {
                            $.facebox.close();
    
++++++++++++++++++23+++++++++++++++++++++++
                        if (json["success"] === "true") {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("Blog has been successfully attached to selected contest");
                            } else {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("There is unexpected error while attaching blog to the contest");
                            }
                        }
                    }, "json");
                }

                return false;
            });

            var contestSelect = $("#blogEntry-55417-contestId");
            var popupContestSelect = $("#facebox #blogEntry-55417-contestId");

            if (popupContestSelect.is(":disabled")) {
                $.post("/data/contests?action=getContestListWithEditableResources", function (data) {
                    if (data["result"] === "success") {
                        var contests = data["contests"];

                        for (var i = 0, contestCount = contests.length; i < contestCount; ++i) {
                            //noinspection StringLiteralBreaksHTMLJS
                            var contestOptionHtml = "<option value=\"" + contests[i]["id"] + "\">"
                                    + contests[i]["id"] + " - " + contests[i]["name"] + "</option>";
                            contestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                            popupContestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                        }

                        contestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#blogEntry-55417-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#blogEntry-55417-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        popupContestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55417-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55417-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");
                    } else {
                        alert("Can't receive contest list");
 
++++++++++++++++++24+++++++++++++++++++++++
                   }
                }, "json");
            }

            return false;
        });
    });
</script>



        <span style="position:absolute;right:0;top:0.05em;margin-right:1em;display:inline;font-size:0.75em;">
            <div style="margin-top:0.25em;">
            </div>
        </span>
    </div>

    <div class="content">
        <div class="ttypography"><p>Hello Codeforces!</p><p>On <a href="http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?day=27&amp;month=10&amp;year=2017&amp;hour=17&amp;min=5&amp;sec=0&amp;p1=166">October 27, 17:05 MSK</a> Educational Codeforces Round 31 will start.</p><p>Series of Educational Rounds continue being held as <a href="https://harbour.space/">Harbour.Space University</a> initiative! You can read the details about the cooperation between <a href="https://harbour.space/">Harbour.Space University</a> and Codeforces in the <a href="http://codeforces.com/blog/entry/51208">blog post</a>.</p><p>The round will be <strong>unrated</strong> for all users and will be held on extented ACM ICPC rules. After the end of the contest you will have one day to hack any solution you want. You will have access to copy any solution and test it locally.</p><p>You will be given <strong>6 problems</strong> and <strong>2 hours</strong> to solve them.</p><p>The problems were prepared by Ivan <a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/BledDest" title="Candidate Master BledDest">BledDest</a> Androsov, Vladimir <a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/0n25" title="Candidate Master 0n25">0n25</a> Petrov, Alexey <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/Perforator" title="Grandmaster Perforator">Perforator</a> Ripinen, Mike <a class="rated-user user-admin" href="/profile/MikeMirzayanov" title="Headquarters, MikeMirzayanov">MikeMirzayanov</a> Mirzayanov and me.</p><p>Good luck to all participants!</p><p>Congratulations to the winners: <table>  <tbody>  <tr>  <th>Rank</th>  <th>Competitor</th>  <th>Problems Solved</th>  <th>Penalty</th>  </tr>  <tr>
++++++++++++++++++25+++++++++++++++++++++++
  <td>1</td>  <td><a class="rated-user user-orange" href="/profile/biGinNer" title="Master biGinNer">biGinNer</a></td>  <td>6</td>  <td>175</td>  </tr>  <tr>  <td>2</td>  <td><a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/natsugiri" title="International Grandmaster natsugiri">natsugiri</a></td>  <td>6</td>  <td>228</td>  </tr>  <tr>  <td>3</td>  <td><a class="rated-user user-violet"         $(document).ready(function () {
    $(".topic-vote-up-55691").click(function () {
        $.post("/data/topic/vote", {topicId: 55691, _tta: Codeforces.tta(), topicRevisionId: 128644, vote: +1}, function(data) {
            Codeforces.showMessage(data);
        }, "json");
        return false;
    });
    $(".topic-vote-down-55691").click(function () {
        $.post("/data/topic/vote", {topicId: 55691, _tta: Codeforces.tta(), topicRevisionId: 128644, vote: -1}, function(data) {
            Codeforces.showMessage(data);
        }, "json");
        return false;
    });

<script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $(".blogEntry-55402-error").hide();

        $(".attach-blogEntry-55402-to-contest-link").click(function () {
            Codeforces.facebox(".attach-blogEntry-55402-to-contest-form-holder", "http://st.codeforces.com/s/81047");

            $("#facebox .attach-blogEntry-55402-to-contest-form").submit(function () {
                if ($(this).find(":disabled").length === 0) {
                    $("#facebox .blogEntry-55402-error").hide();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-55402-resource-submitting-indicator").show();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-55402-resource-submit").attr("dis
++++++++++++++++++31+++++++++++++++++++++++
abled", "disabled");

                    //noinspection JSUnusedGlobalSymbols
                    $.post("/data/blogAndContest?action=attachBlogToContest", {
                        blogId:"22906", contestId:$("#facebox #blogEntry-55402-contestId").val(),
                        blogEntryId:"55402",
                        resourceType:$("#facebox #blogEntry-55402-resourceType").val()
                    }, function (json) {
                        var validated = true;

                        for (var key in json) {
                            if (json.hasOwnProperty(key) && key.indexOf("error__") === 0) {
                                validated = false;
                                $("#facebox .blogEntry-55402-" + key.substring("error__".length) + "-error").show();
                                $("#facebox .for__blogEntry-55402-" + key.substring("error__".length)).text(json[key]);
                            }
                        }

                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55402-resource-submitting-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55402-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        if (validated) {
                            $.facebox.close();
                            if (json["success"] === "true") {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("Blog has been successfully attached to selected contest");
                            } else {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("There is unexpected error while attaching blog to the contest");
                            }
                        }
                    }, "json");
                }

                return false;
            });

            var contestSelect = $("#blogEntry-55402-contestId");
            var popupContestSelect = $("#facebox #blogEntry-55402-contestId");

            if (popupContestSelect.is(":disabled")) {
                $.post("/data/contests?action=getContestListWithEditableResources"
++++++++++++++++++32+++++++++++++++++++++++
, function (data) {
                    if (data["result"] === "success") {
                        var contests = data["contests"];

                        for (var i = 0, contestCount = contests.length; i < contestCount; ++i) {
                            //noinspection StringLiteralBreaksHTMLJS
                            var contestOptionHtml = "<option value=\"" + contests[i]["id"] + "\">"
                                    + contests[i]["id"] + " - " + contests[i]["name"] + "</option>";
                            contestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                            popupContestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                        }

                        contestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#blogEntry-55402-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#blogEntry-55402-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        popupContestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55402-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55402-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");
                    } else {
                        alert("Can't receive contest list");
                    }
                }, "json");
            }

            return false;
        });
    });
</script>

    </div>

    <div class="content">
        <div class="ttypography"><p>Hello everybody!</p><p>Round 443 will start on Thursday, <a href="https://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?msg=Codeforces+Round+443&amp;iso=20171026T1735&amp;p1=166&amp;ah=2">26 October in 17:35 MSK</a>.</p><p>Tasks are prepared by me, Konstantin Khadaev. It's my first round on Codeforces. Thanks to <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/zemen" title="Int
++++++++++++++++++33+++++++++++++++++++++++
ernational Grandmaster zemen">zemen</a>, <a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/AlexFetisov" title="Candidate Master AlexFetisov">AlexFetisov</a>, <a class="rated-user user-legendary" href="/profile/vepifanov" title="Legendary grandmaster vepifanov"><span class="legendary-user-first-letter">v</span>epifanov</a>, and <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/Belonogov" title="International Grandmaster Belonogov">Belonogov</a> for testing problems,  <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/KAN" title="Grandmaster KAN">KAN</a> for coordination, and <a class="rated-user user-admin" href="/profile/MikeMirzayanov" title="Headquarters, MikeMirzayanov">MikeMirzayanov</a> for this site and the Polygon platform.</p><p>Both divisions will have five problems to solve in two hours.</p><p>Scoring: in Div 1: 500 — <strong>1250</strong> — <strong>1250</strong> — 2000 — 2500, in Div 2: 500 — 1000 — 1500 — <strong>2250</strong> — <strong>2250</strong></p><p>Good luck to all!</p><p><strong>UPD1</strong>: Congrats to the winners!</p><p>Div 1:</p> <ol>   <li><a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/dotorya" title="International Grandmaster dotorya">dotorya</a> — solved all problems!</li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-legendary" href="/profile/Um_nik" title="Legendary grandmaster Um_nik"><span class="legendary-user-first-letter">U</span>m_nik</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-legendary" href="/profile/moejy0viiiiiv" title="Legendary grandmaster moejy0viiiiiv"><span class="legendary-user-first-letter">m</span>oejy0viiiiiv</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/V--o_o--V" title="Grandmaster V--o_o--V">V--o_o--V</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/Errichto" title="Grandmaster Errichto">Errichto</a></li> </ol><p>Div 2:</p> <ol>   <li><a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/monsoon" title="Expert monsoon">monsoon</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/ulianich-m27" title="Expert ulianich-m27">ulianich-m27</a></li>
++++++++++++++++++34+++++++++++++++++++++++
   <li><a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/Roooooo" title="Expert Roooooo">Roooooo</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/stasio6" title="Expert stasio6">stasio6</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/AngusRitossa" title="Expert AngusRitossa">AngusRitossa</a></li> </ol></div><p><a href="/blog/entry/55402">Read more »</a></p>

<div class="topic" topicId="55598">
    <div class="title">
            <a href="/blog/entry/55324">            <p>Codeforces Round #442 (Div. 2). Announcement</p>
</a>
    </div>

    <div class="info" style="position:relative;">
            By&nbsp;<a href="/profile/Livace" title="Candidate Master Livace" class="rated-user user-violet">Livace</a>,
                <a href="/topic/55598/en5">history</a>,
            <span class="format-humantime" title="Oct/21/2017 15:27">11 days ago</span>,
            translation,

<script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $(".blogEntry-55324-error").hide();

        $(".attach-blogEntry-55324-to-contest-link").click(function () {
            Codeforces.facebox(".attach-blogEntry-55324-to-contest-form-holder", "http://st.codeforces.com/s/81047");

            $("#facebox .attach-blogEntry-55324-to-contest-form").submit(function () {
                if ($(this).find(":disabled").length === 0) {
                    $("#facebox .blogEntry-55324-error").hide();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-55324-resource-submitting-indicator").show();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-55324-resource-submit").attr("disabled", "disabled");

                    //noinspection JSUnusedGlobalSymbols
                    $.post("/data/blogAndContest?action=attachBlogToContest", {
                        blogId:"57814", contestId:$("#facebox #blogEntry-55324-contestId").val(),
                        blogEntryId:"55324",
                        resourceType:$("#facebox #blogEntry-55324-resourceType").val()
                    }, function (json) {
                        var validated = true;

                        for (var key in json) {
                            if (json.ha
++++++++++++++++++39+++++++++++++++++++++++
sOwnProperty(key) && key.indexOf("error__") === 0) {
                                validated = false;
                                $("#facebox .blogEntry-55324-" + key.substring("error__".length) + "-error").show();
                                $("#facebox .for__blogEntry-55324-" + key.substring("error__".length)).text(json[key]);
                            }
                        }

                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55324-resource-submitting-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55324-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        if (validated) {
                            $.facebox.close();
                            if (json["success"] === "true") {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("Blog has been successfully attached to selected contest");
                            } else {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("There is unexpected error while attaching blog to the contest");
                            }
                        }
                    }, "json");
                }

                return false;
            });

            var contestSelect = $("#blogEntry-55324-contestId");
            var popupContestSelect = $("#facebox #blogEntry-55324-contestId");

            if (popupContestSelect.is(":disabled")) {
                $.post("/data/contests?action=getContestListWithEditableResources", function (data) {
                    if (data["result"] === "success") {
                        var contests = data["contests"];

                        for (var i = 0, contestCount = contests.length; i < contestCount; ++i) {
                            //noinspection StringLiteralBreaksHTMLJS
                            var contestOptionHtml = "<option value=\"" + contests[i]["id"] + "\">"
                                    + contests[i]["id"] + " - " + contests[i]["name"] + "</option>";
                            contestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml)
++++++++++++++++++40+++++++++++++++++++++++
;
                            popupContestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                        }

                        contestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#blogEntry-55324-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#blogEntry-55324-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        popupContestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55324-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55324-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");
                    } else {
                        alert("Can't receive contest list");
                    }
                }, "json");
            }

            return false;
        });
    });
</script>

    <div class="content">
        <div class="ttypography"><p>Hi, Codeforces!</p><p><a href="https://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?msg=Codeforces+Round+%23442+%28Div.+2%29&amp;iso=20171023T1835&amp;p1=166&amp;ah=2">On monday, October 23rd, at 18:35 MSK</a> rated Div. 2 round will be held. Participants from first division can take part out of competition.</p><p>The problems for this round were prepared by me. Thanks to Daniil (<a class="rated-user user-orange" href="/profile/qoo2p5" title="Master qoo2p5">qoo2p5</a>) Nikolenko, Nikita (<a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/neckbosov" title="Candidate Master neckbosov">neckbosov</a>) Bosov, Alexander (<a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/Alladdin" title="Candidate Master Alladdin">Alladdin</a>) Proskurin, AmirReza (<a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/Arpa" title="Candidate Master Arpa">Arpa</a>) PoorAkhavan, Ildar (<a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/gainullin.ildar" title="Grandmaster gainu

        $(document).ready(function () {
    $(".topic-vote-up-55598").click(function () {
        $.post("/data/topic/vote", {topicId: 55598, _tta: Codeforces.tta(), topicRevisionId: 128403, vote: +1}, function(data) {
            Codeforces.showMessage(data);
        }, "json");
        return false;
    });
    $(".topic-vote-down-55598").click(function () {
        $.post("/data/topic/vote", {topicId: 55598, _tta: Codeforces.tta(), topicRevisionId: 128403, vote: -1}, function(data) {
            Codeforces.showMessage(data);
        }, "json");
        return false;
    });
        });

<script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $(".blogEntry-55296-error").hide();

        $(".attach-blogEntry-55296-to-contest-link").click(function () {
            Codeforces.facebox(".attach-blogEntry-55296-to-contest-form-holder", "http://st.codeforces.com/s/81047");

            $("#facebox .attach-blogEntry-55296-to-contest-form").submit(function () {
                if ($(this).find(":disabled").length === 0) {
                    $("#facebox .blogEntry-55296-error").hide();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-55296-resource-submitting-indicator").show();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-55296-resource-submit").attr("disabled", "disabled");

                    //noinspection JSUnusedGlobalSymbols
                    $.post("/data/blogAndContest?action=attachBlogToContest", {
                        blogId:"1", contestId:$("#facebox #blogEntry-55296-contestId").val(),
                        blogEntryId:"55296",
                        resourceType:$("#facebox #blogEntry-55296-resourceType").val()
      
++++++++++++++++++47+++++++++++++++++++++++
              }, function (json) {
                        var validated = true;

                        for (var key in json) {
                            if (json.hasOwnProperty(key) && key.indexOf("error__") === 0) {
                                validated = false;
                                $("#facebox .blogEntry-55296-" + key.substring("error__".length) + "-error").show();
                                $("#facebox .for__blogEntry-55296-" + key.substring("error__".length)).text(json[key]);
                            }
                        }

                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55296-resource-submitting-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55296-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        if (validated) {
                            $.facebox.close();
                            if (json["success"] === "true") {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("Blog has been successfully attached to selected contest");
                            } else {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("There is unexpected error while attaching blog to the contest");
                            }
                        }
                    }, "json");
                }

                return false;
            });

            var contestSelect = $("#blogEntry-55296-contestId");
            var popupContestSelect = $("#facebox #blogEntry-55296-contestId");

            if (popupContestSelect.is(":disabled")) {
                $.post("/data/contests?action=getContestListWithEditableResources", function (data) {
                    if (data["result"] === "success") {
                        var contests = data["contests"];

                        for (var i = 0, contestCount = contests.length; i < contestCount; ++i) {
                            //noinspection StringLiteralBreaksHTMLJS
                            var contestOptionHtml = "<option value=\"" + contests[i]["id"] + "\"
++++++++++++++++++48+++++++++++++++++++++++
>"
                                    + contests[i]["id"] + " - " + contests[i]["name"] + "</option>";
                            contestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                            popupContestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                        }

                        contestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#blogEntry-55296-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#blogEntry-55296-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        popupContestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55296-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55296-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");
                    } else {
                        alert("Can't receive contest list");
                    }
                }, "json");
            }

            return false;
        });
    });
</script>



        <span style="position:absolute;right:0;top:0.05em;margin-right:1em;display:inline;font-size:0.75em;">

    <div class="content">
        <div class="ttypography"><p>Hello!</p><p>ACM-ICPC Southern Subregional Contest (NEERC/Northern Eurasia) 2017 has ended on October 18. There were 73 teams onsite in Saratov, most of them were invited because of their result on <a href="https://icpc.sgu.ru/">the qualification stage</a>.</p><p>On <a href="http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?day=21&amp;month=10&amp;year=2017&amp;hour=11&amp;min=5&amp;sec=0&amp;p1=166">Saturday, October 21, 08:05 (UTC)</a> will start online-mirror <a href="/contest/883" title="2017-2018 ACM-ICPC, NEERC, Southern Subregional Contest (Online Mirror, ACM-ICPC Rules, Teams Preferred)">2017-2018 ACM-ICPC, NEERC, Southern Subregional Contest (Online Mirror, ACM-ICPC Rules, Teams Preferred)</a>.</p><p>I invite ACM-ICPC teams and individual participants of Co
++++++++++++++++++49+++++++++++++++++++++++
deforces competitions to take part! Sure, the contest will be unrated.</p><p><a class="rated-user user-admin" href="/profile/MikeMirzayanov" title="Headquarters, MikeMirzayanov">MikeMirzayanov</a></p></div><p><a href="/blog/entry/55296">Read more »</a></p>
    </div>


        <div style="font-size: 1.1rem;line-height: 11px;">
            <img style="vertical-align: middle;" src="http://st.codeforces.com/s/81047/images/blog/tags.png" title="Tags" alt="Tags"/>
                <span style="padding: 0 0.35em;">
    <a href="/search?query=neerc" class="tag notice" style="text-decoration: none;">neerc</a>,

<script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $(".blogEntry-55201-error").hide();

        $(".attach-blogEntry-55201-to-contest-link").click(function () {
            Codeforces.facebox(".attach-blogEntry-55201-to-contest-form-holder", "http://st.codeforces.com/s/81047");

            $("#facebox .attach-blogEntry-55201-to-contest-form").submit(function () {
                if ($(this).find(":disabled").length === 0) {
                    $("#facebox .blogEntry-55201-error").hide();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-55201-resource-submitting-indicator").show();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-55201-resource-submit").attr("disabled", "disabled");

                    //noinspection JSUnusedGlobalSymbols
                    $.post("/data/blogAndContest?action=attachBlogToContest", {
                        blogId:"1555", contestId:$("#facebox #blogEntry-55201-contestId").val(),
                        blogEntryId:"55201",
                        resourceType:$("#facebox #blogEntry-55201-resourceType").val()
     
++++++++++++++++++54+++++++++++++++++++++++
               }, function (json) {
                        var validated = true;

                        for (var key in json) {
                            if (json.hasOwnProperty(key) && key.indexOf("error__") === 0) {
                                validated = false;
                                $("#facebox .blogEntry-55201-" + key.substring("error__".length) + "-error").show();
                                $("#facebox .for__blogEntry-55201-" + key.substring("error__".length)).text(json[key]);
                            }
                        }

                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55201-resource-submitting-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55201-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        if (validated) {
                            $.facebox.close();
                            if (json["success"] === "true") {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("Blog has been successfully attached to selected contest");
                            } else {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("There is unexpected error while attaching blog to the contest");
                            }
                        }
                    }, "json");
                }

                return false;
            });

            var contestSelect = $("#blogEntry-55201-contestId");
            var popupContestSelect = $("#facebox #blogEntry-55201-contestId");

            if (popupContestSelect.is(":disabled")) {
                $.post("/data/contests?action=getContestListWithEditableResources", function (data) {
                    if (data["result"] === "success") {
                        var contests = data["contests"];

                        for (var i = 0, contestCount = contests.length; i < contestCount; ++i) {
                            //noinspection StringLiteralBreaksHTMLJS
                            var contestOptionHtml = "<option value=\"" + contests[i]["id"] + "\
++++++++++++++++++55+++++++++++++++++++++++
">"
                                    + contests[i]["id"] + " - " + contests[i]["name"] + "</option>";
                            contestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                            popupContestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                        }

                        contestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#blogEntry-55201-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#blogEntry-55201-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        popupContestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55201-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55201-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");
                    } else {
                        alert("Can't receive contest list");
                    }
                }, "json");
            }

            return false;
        });
    });
</script>



        <span style="position:absolute;right:0;top:0.05em;margin-right:1em;display:inline;font-size:0.75em;">
            <div style="margin-top:0.25em;">
            </div>
        </span>
    </div>

    <div class="content">
        <div class="ttypography"><p>Hi everybody,</p><p>Lasts Sunday there was a 15th <a href="http://olympiads.ru/team">Moscow Team Olympiad</a>, high school students competition based in Moscow that is an elimination contest for All-Russian Team Olympiad. This contest is prepared by Moscow Olympiad Scientific Committee that you may know by Moscow Open Olympiad, Moscow Olympiad for Young Students and Megapolises Olympiad (rounds <a href="http://codeforces.com/blog/entry/21185">327</a>, <a href="http://codeforces.com/blog/entry/23309">342</a>, <a href="http://codeforces.com/blog/entry/43615">345</a>, <a href="http://codeforces.com/blog/entry/47769">376</a>, <a href="http://codeforces.com/blog/entry/50613">401</a>, <a href="http://codeforces.com/blog/entry/54350">433</a>). </p><p>Round will be held at <a
++++++++++++++++++56+++++++++++++++++++++++
 href="http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?day=16&amp;month=10&amp;year=2017&amp;hour=14&amp;min=5&amp;sec=0&amp;p1=166">11:05 UTC on Monday</a> and will last for 2 hours. Each division will consist of 6 problems.</p><p>Problems are prepared <a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/Andreikkaa" title="Candidate Master Andreikkaa">Andreikkaa</a>, <a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/sender" title="Expert sender">sender</a>, <a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/Flyrise" title="Candidate Master Flyrise">Flyrise</a>, <a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/-__-" title="Candidate Master -__-">-__-</a>, <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/kraskevich" title="International Grandmaster kraskevich">kraskevich</a>, <a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/wilwell" title="Expert wilwell">wilwell</a> under supervision of your humble servant with great help of <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/GlebsHP" title="International Grandmaster GlebsHP">GlebsHP</a>, <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/_meshanya_" title="Grandmaster _meshanya_">_meshanya_</a>, <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/Endagorion" title="International Grandmaster Endagorion">Endagorion</a> and Helen Andreeva.</p><p><strong>Discussing problems with anybody who was a participant of Moscow Team Olympiad is strictly prohibited and may be a reason for disqualification.</strong></p><p>Good luck everybody!</p><p><strong>UPD</strong>: Thanks everybody for participation, congratulations to round winner!</p><p>Div1 winners:</p> <ol>   <li><a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/fateice" title="International Grandmaster fateice">fateice</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/simonlindholm" title="International Grandmaster simonlindholm">simonlindholm</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/Haghani" title="Grandmaster Haghani">Haghani</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/yjq_naive" title="Grandmaster
++++++++++++++++++57+++++++++++++++++++++++
 yjq_naive">yjq_naive</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-legendary" href="/profile/Petr" title="Legendary grandmaster Petr"><span class="legendary-user-first-letter">P</span>etr</a></li> </ol><p>Div2 winners:</p> <ol>   <li><a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/Cypi" title="Expert Cypi">Cypi</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/Nu11" title="Expert Nu11">Nu11</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/ZJT_IOI_2020_AK" title="Expert ZJT_IOI_2020_AK">ZJT_IOI_2020_AK</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/guoxingzhuo" title="Expert guoxingzhuo">guoxingzhuo</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/Senji" title="Expert Senji">Senji</a></li> </ol><p>Editorial will be published today after a while.</p><p><strong>UPD2</strong>: <a href="/blog/entry/55233">Editorial</a>!</p></div><p><a href="/blog/entry/55201">Read more »</a></p>
    </div>

    <div style="font-size: 1.1rem;line-height: 1.1rem;padding-bottom: 0.5em;">

            <a href="/blog/entry/55167">            <p>Codeforces Round 440 Div.1+Div.2 (and Technocup 2018 — Elimination Round 2)</p>

    </div>

    <div class="info" style="position:relative;">
            By&nbsp;<a href="/profile/MikeMirzayanov" title="Headquarters, MikeMirzayanov" class="rated-user user-admin">MikeMirzayanov</a>,
            <span class="format-humantime" title="Oct/13/2017 20:01">3 weeks ago</span>,

                        <option value="DISCUSSION">discussion</option>
                    </select>
                </td>

<script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $(".blogEntry-55167-error").hide();

        $(".attach-blogEntry-55167-to-contest-link").click(function () {
            Codeforces.facebox(".attach-blogEntry-55167-to-contest-form-holder", "http://st.codeforces.com/s/81047");

            $("#facebox .attach-blogEntry-55167-to-contest-form").submit(function () {
                if ($(this).find(":disabled").length === 0) {
                    $("#facebox .blogEntry-55167-error").hide();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-55167-resource-submitting-indicator").show();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-55167-resource-submit").attr("disabled", "disabled");

                    //noinspection JSUnusedGlobalSymbols
                    $.post("/data/blogAndContest?action=attachBlogToContest", {
                        blogId:"1", contestId:$("#facebox #blogEntry-55167-contestId").val(),
                        blogEntryId:"55167",
                        resourceType:$("#facebox #blogEntry-55167-resourceType").val()
                    }, function (json) {
                        var validated = true;

                        for (var key in json) {
                            if (json.hasOwnProperty(key) && key.indexOf("error__") === 0) {
                                validated = false;
                                $("#facebox .blogEntry-55167-" + key.substring("error__".length) + "-error").show();
                                $("#facebox .for__blogEntry-55167-" + key.substring("error__".length)).text(json[key]);
                            }
                        }

                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55167-resource-submitting-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55167-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

   
++++++++++++++++++63+++++++++++++++++++++++
                     if (validated) {
                            $.facebox.close();
                            if (json["success"] === "true") {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("Blog has been successfully attached to selected contest");
                            } else {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("There is unexpected error while attaching blog to the contest");
                            }
                        }
                    }, "json");
                }

                return false;
            });

            var contestSelect = $("#blogEntry-55167-contestId");
            var popupContestSelect = $("#facebox #blogEntry-55167-contestId");

            if (popupContestSelect.is(":disabled")) {
                $.post("/data/contests?action=getContestListWithEditableResources", function (data) {
                    if (data["result"] === "success") {
                        var contests = data["contests"];

                        for (var i = 0, contestCount = contests.length; i < contestCount; ++i) {
                            //noinspection StringLiteralBreaksHTMLJS
                            var contestOptionHtml = "<option value=\"" + contests[i]["id"] + "\">"
                                    + contests[i]["id"] + " - " + contests[i]["name"] + "</option>";
                            contestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                            popupContestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                        }

                        contestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#blogEntry-55167-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#blogEntry-55167-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        popupContestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55167-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55167-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");
  
++++++++++++++++++64+++++++++++++++++++++++
                  } else {
                        alert("Can't receive contest list");
                    }
                }, "json");
            }

            return false;
        });
    });
</script>

    <div class="content">
        <div class="ttypography"><p>Codeforces Round 440 will start on <a href="http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?day=15&amp;month=10&amp;year=2017&amp;hour=11&amp;min=5&amp;sec=0&amp;p1=166">October 15 (Sunday), 08:05 (UTC)</a>. It will be based on Technocup 2018 Elimination Round 2. So, if you are a Russian-speaking high-school student, please take part in the <a href="https://technocup.mail.ru/">Technocup 2018</a>.</p><p>Codeforces Round 440 is <b>open and rated for everyone</b>.</p><p>Wish you good luck and bugless code.</p><p><a href="http://codeforces.com/blog/entry/55200">Editorial</a> is posted.</p><p>Congratulations to winners!</p><p>Technocup official round:</p> <ol>   <li><a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/Horoshi_chelovek" title="Candidate Master Horoshi_chelovek">Horoshi_chelovek</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/scanhex" title="Candidate Master scanhex">scanhex</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/Krisha" title="Expert Krisha">Krisha</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/ZinchenkoDanil" title="Candidate Master ZinchenkoDanil">ZinchenkoDanil</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/neckbosov" title="Candidate Master neckbosov">neckbosov</a></li> </ol><p>Div. 1:</p> <ol>   <li><a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/khadaev" title="International Grandmaster khadaev">khadaev</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/Errichto" title="International Grandmaster Errichto">Errichto</a></li>   <li>

    $(".topic-vote-up-55441").click(function () {

        }, "json");

<script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $(".blogEntry-55145-error").hide();

        $(".attach-blogEntry-55145-to-contest-link").click(function () {
            Codeforces.facebox(".attach-blogEntry-55145-to-contest-form-holder", "http://st.codeforces.com/s/81047");

            $("#facebox .attach-blogEntry-55145-to-contest-form").submit(function () {
                if ($(this).find(":disabled").length === 0) {
                    $("#facebox .blogEntry-55145-error").hide();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-55145-resource-submitting-indicator").show();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-55145-resource-submit").attr("disabled", "disabled");

                    //noinspection JSUnusedGlobalSymbols
                    $.post("/data/blogAndContest?action=attachBlogToContest", {
                        blogId:"11391", contestId:$("#facebox #blogEntry-55145-contestId").val(),
                        blogEntryId:"55145",
                        resourceType:$("#facebox #blogEntry-55145-resourceType").val()
                    }, function (json) {
                        var validated = true;

                        for (var key in json) {
                            if (json.hasOwnProperty(key) && key.indexOf("error__") === 0) {
                                validated = false;
                                $("#facebox .blogEntry-551
++++++++++++++++++71+++++++++++++++++++++++
45-" + key.substring("error__".length) + "-error").show();
                                $("#facebox .for__blogEntry-55145-" + key.substring("error__".length)).text(json[key]);
                            }
                        }

                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55145-resource-submitting-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55145-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        if (validated) {
                            $.facebox.close();
                            if (json["success"] === "true") {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("Blog has been successfully attached to selected contest");
                            } else {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("There is unexpected error while attaching blog to the contest");
                            }
                        }
                    }, "json");
                }

                return false;
            });

            var contestSelect = $("#blogEntry-55145-contestId");
            var popupContestSelect = $("#facebox #blogEntry-55145-contestId");

            if (popupContestSelect.is(":disabled")) {
                $.post("/data/contests?action=getContestListWithEditableResources", function (data) {
                    if (data["result"] === "success") {
                        var contests = data["contests"];

                        for (var i = 0, contestCount = contests.length; i < contestCount; ++i) {
                            //noinspection StringLiteralBreaksHTMLJS
                            var contestOptionHtml = "<option value=\"" + contests[i]["id"] + "\">"
                                    + contests[i]["id"] + " - " + contests[i]["name"] + "</option>";

                            popupContestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                        }

++++++++++++++++++72+++++++++++++++++++++++
d");
                        $("#blogEntry-55145-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#blogEntry-55145-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        popupContestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55145-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55145-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");
                    } else {
                        alert("Can't receive contest list");
                    }
                }, "json");
            }

            return false;
        });
    });
</script>
