    <div class="content">
        <div class="ttypography"><p>Hello everyone!</p><p><img alt=" " src="/predownloaded/5b/4f/5b4f9bc2c7dc78fde3b27ca04d19c058b29b4ddb.png" style="max-width: 100.0%;max-height: 100.0%;" /></p><p>From 7 to 16 of November 2017, <a href="https://it-edu.mipt.ru/en/fall_training_2017?utm_source=codeforces&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=workshop"><strong>Moscow International Workshop ACM ICPC 2017</strong></a> is going to be held at MIPT.</p><p>We’d like to remind you that there are only a few days left before the participation cost grows again: if you pay before Oct.16, 2017, the price will be $600. </p><p>What’s more, if you have tight curricula, you can choose a <strong>short</strong> Workshop program which lasts from 9 to 16 of November 2017. Please, pay attention that the <strong>prices</strong> for a short program are also <strong>reduced</strong>.</p><p>Also you can apply for <a href="https://it-edu.mipt.ru/en/online-participation?utm_source=codeforces&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=workshop"><strong>online participation</strong></a> and solve all the contests remotely. </p><p>This time you’ll see some <strong>ne
++++++++++++++++++73+++++++++++++++++++++++
w</strong> features:</p><p>1)Sometimes the coaches and ACM-ICPC seniors will be present during the upsolving, so you can ask them questions. <em>(Special thanks to the guys who give us feedback about our Workshops!)</em></p><p>2) There will be organized one lecture for the division A, which will be interesting for the strongest participants.</p><p><img alt=" " src="/predownloaded/0d/3a/0d3acc7199c98e9e2c92306702811702ae8bdd25.png" style="max-width: 100.0%;max-height: 100.0%;" /></p><p>In addition to contests, analyses, and lectures, you’ll enjoy a sightseeing tour in Moscow and events organized by our volunteers! ;) </p></div><p><a href="/blog/entry/55145">Read more »</a></p>
    </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $(".blogEntry-55133-error").hide();

        $(".attach-blogEntry-55133-to-contest-link").click(function () {
            Codeforces.facebox(".attach-blogEntry-55133-to-contest-form-holder", "http://st.codeforces.com/s/81047");

            $("#facebox .attach-blogEntry-55133-to-contest-form").submit(function () {
                if ($(this).find(":disabled").length === 0) {
                    $("#facebox .blogEntry-55133-error").hide();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-55133-resource-submitting-indicator").show();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-55133-resource-submit").attr("disabled", "disabled");

                    //noinspection JSUnusedGlobalSymbols
                    $.post("/data/blogAndContest?action=attachBlogToContest", {
                        blogId:"42750", contestId:$("#facebox #blogEntry-55133-contestId").val(),
                        blogEntryId:"55133",
                        resourceType:$("#facebox #blogEntry-55133-resourceType").val()
                    }, function (json) {
                        var validated = true;

                        for (var key in json) {
                            if (json.hasOwnProperty(key) && key.indexOf("error__") === 0) {
                                validated = false;
                                $("#facebox .blogEntry-55133-" + key.substring("error__".length) + "-error").show();
                                $("#facebox .for__blogEntry-55133-" + key.substring("error__".length)).text(json[key]);
                            }
                        }

            
++++++++++++++++++78+++++++++++++++++++++++
            $("#facebox #blogEntry-55133-resource-submitting-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55133-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        if (validated) {
                            $.facebox.close();
                            if (json["success"] === "true") {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("Blog has been successfully attached to selected contest");
                            } else {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("There is unexpected error while attaching blog to the contest");
                            }
                        }
                    }, "json");
                }

                return false;
            });

            var contestSelect = $("#blogEntry-55133-contestId");
            var popupContestSelect = $("#facebox #blogEntry-55133-contestId");

            if (popupContestSelect.is(":disabled")) {
                $.post("/data/contests?action=getContestListWithEditableResources", function (data) {
                    if (data["result"] === "success") {
                        var contests = data["contests"];

                        for (var i = 0, contestCount = contests.length; i < contestCount; ++i) {
                            //noinspection StringLiteralBreaksHTMLJS
                            var contestOptionHtml = "<option value=\"" + contests[i]["id"] + "\">"
                                    + contests[i]["id"] + " - " + contests[i]["name"] + "</option>";
                            contestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                            popupContestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                        }

                        contestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#blogEntry-55133-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#blogEntry-55133-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        popupContestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
       
++++++++++++++++++79+++++++++++++++++++++++
                 $("#facebox #blogEntry-55133-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-55133-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");
                    } else {
                        alert("Can't receive contest list");
                    }
                }, "json");
            }

            return false;
        });
    });
</script>



        <span style="position:absolute;right:0;top:0.05em;margin-right:1em;display:inline;font-size:0.75em;">
            <div style="margin-top:0.25em;">
            </div>
        </span>
    </div>

    <div class="content">
        <div class="ttypography"><p>Hello Codeforces!</p><p>On <a href="http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?day=12&amp;month=10&amp;year=2017&amp;hour=17&amp;min=5&amp;sec=0&amp;p1=166">October 12, 17:05 MSK</a> Educational Codeforces Round 30 will start.</p><p>Series of Educational Rounds continue being held as <a href="https://harbour.space/">Harbour.Space University</a> initiative! You can read the details about the cooperation between <a href="https://harbour.space/">Harbour.Space University</a> and Codeforces in the <a href="http://codeforces.com/blog/entry/51208">blog post</a>.</p><p>The round will be <strong>unrated</strong> for all users and will be held on extented ACM ICPC rules. After the end of the contest you will have one day to hack any solution you want. You will have access to copy any solution and test it locally.</p><p>You will be given <strong>6 problems</strong> and <strong>2 hours</strong> to solve them.</p><p>The problems were prepared by Ivan <a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/BledDest" title="Candidate Master BledDest">BledDest</a> Androsov, Vladimir <a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/0n25" title="Candidate Master 0n25">0n25</a> Petrov, Mike <a class="rated-user user-admin" href="/profile/MikeMirzayanov" title="Headquarters, MikeMirzayanov">MikeMirzayanov</a> Mirzayanov and me.</p><p>Good luck to all participants!
++++++++++++++++++80+++++++++++++++++++++++
</p><p>Congratulations to the winners: <table>  <tbody>  <tr>  <th>Rank</th>  <th>Competitor</th>  <th>Problems Solved</th>  <th>Penalty</th>  </tr>  <tr>  <td>1</td>  <td><a class="rated-user <script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $(".blogEntry-54971-error").hide();

        $(".attach-blogEntry-54971-to-contest-link").click(function () {
            Codeforces.facebox(".attach-blogEntry-54971-to-contest-form-holder", "http://st.codeforces.com/s/81047");

            $("#facebox .attach-blogEntry-54971-to-contest-form").submit(function () {
                if ($(this).find(":disable
++++++++++++++++++86+++++++++++++++++++++++
d").length === 0) {
                    $("#facebox .blogEntry-54971-error").hide();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-54971-resource-submitting-indicator").show();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-54971-resource-submit").attr("disabled", "disabled");

                    //noinspection JSUnusedGlobalSymbols
                    $.post("/data/blogAndContest?action=attachBlogToContest", {
                        blogId:"83693", contestId:$("#facebox #blogEntry-54971-contestId").val(),
                        blogEntryId:"54971",
                        resourceType:$("#facebox #blogEntry-54971-resourceType").val()
                    }, function (json) {
                        var validated = true;

                        for (var key in json) {
                            if (json.hasOwnProperty(key) && key.indexOf("error__") === 0) {
                                validated = false;
                                $("#facebox .blogEntry-54971-" + key.substring("error__".length) + "-error").show();
                                $("#facebox .for__blogEntry-54971-" + key.substring("error__".length)).text(json[key]);
                            }
                        }

                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-54971-resource-submitting-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-54971-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        if (validated) {
                            $.facebox.close();
                            if (json["success"] === "true") {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("Blog has been successfully attached to selected contest");
                            } else {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("There is unexpected error while attaching blog to the contest");
                            }
                        }
                    }, "json");
                }

                return false;
            });

            var contestSelect = 
++++++++++++++++++87+++++++++++++++++++++++
$("#blogEntry-54971-contestId");
            var popupContestSelect = $("#facebox #blogEntry-54971-contestId");

            if (popupContestSelect.is(":disabled")) {
                $.post("/data/contests?action=getContestListWithEditableResources", function (data) {
                    if (data["result"] === "success") {
                        var contests = data["contests"];

                        for (var i = 0, contestCount = contests.length; i < contestCount; ++i) {
                            //noinspection StringLiteralBreaksHTMLJS
                            var contestOptionHtml = "<option value=\"" + contests[i]["id"] + "\">"
                                    + contests[i]["id"] + " - " + contests[i]["name"] + "</option>";
                            contestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                            popupContestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                        }

                        contestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#blogEntry-54971-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#blogEntry-54971-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        popupContestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-54971-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-54971-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");
                    } else {
                        alert("Can't receive contest list");
                    }
                }, "json");
            }

            return false;
        });
    });
</script>



        <span style="position:absolute;right:0;top:0.05em;margin-right:1em;display:inline;font-size:0.75em;">
            <div style="margin-top:0.25em;">
            </div>
        </span>
    </div>

    <div class="content">
        <div class="ttypography"><p>Hi, Codeforces!</p><p>I'm quite excited to invite you to Codeforces Round #439 (Div. 2) which takes place at <a href="https:
++++++++++++++++++88+++++++++++++++++++++++
//www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?day=06&amp;month=10&amp;year=2017&amp;hour=16&amp;min=35&amp;sec=0&amp;p1=166">16:35 MSK on 6 October</a> and lasts for two hours.</p><p>One of the five problems is created by <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/quailty" title="Grandmaster quailty">quailty</a>, and the others are created by me. This is our first round here. </p><p>The round couldn't have been realized without efforts of <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/KAN" title="Grandmaster KAN">KAN</a> and <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/gritukan" title="International Grandmaster gritukan">gritukan</a>. Besides, I also want to say thanks to our testers: <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/cyand1317" title="Grandmaster cyand1317">cyand1317</a>, <a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/visitWorld" title="Expert visitWorld">visitWorld</a>, <a class="rated-user user-orange" href="/profile/Nisiyama_Suzune" title="Master Nisiyama_Suzune">Nisiyama_Suzune</a>, <a class="rated-user user-orange" href="/profile/cdkrot" title="International master cdkrot">cdkrot</a> and <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/gainullin.ildar" title="Grandmaster gainullin.ildar">gainullin.ildar</a>. Thanks for your help to the contest. Also, thanks to <a class="rated-user user-admin" href="/profile/MikeMirzayanov" title="Headquarters, MikeMirzayanov">MikeMirzayanov</a> with the fantastic Codeforces and Polygon platforms.</p><p>The contest will consist of five problems and it is <strong>rated</strong> for Div. 2 contestants. The same as before, Div. 1 contestants can take part out of competition.</p><p>The problems will feature... <em>Well, let's wait and see</em> for another time ;) As per Codeforces tradition, moderate length text and no spoilers about the actual plot.</p><p>I hope you can have fun during the contest. Good luck and have fun, wish you high rating!</p><p>The scoring distribution will be announced later.</p><p>See you tomorrow!</p><p><strong>UPD1</strong> : The scoring 
++++++++++++++++++89+++++++++++++++++++++++
distribution is 500-1000-1500-2250-2500.</p><p><strong>UPD2</strong> : The contest is over. The <a href="http://codeforces.com/blog/entry/55009">editorial</a> is available.</p><p><strong>UPD3</strong> : Congratulations to top five coders!</p><h3>Division 2 :</h3> <ol>   <li><a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/1heart2plans" title="Expert 1heart2plans">1heart2plans</a> (solved all problems!)</li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-black" href="/profile/fatice" title="Unrated, fatice">fatice</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/LuckyPants" title="Expert LuckyPants">LuckyPants</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/xza" title="Expert xza">xza</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/T404" title="Expert T404">T404</a></li> </ol><h3>Division 1 + Division 2 :</h3> <ol>   <li><a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/1heart2plans" title="Expert 1heart2plans">1heart2plans</a> (solved all problems!)</li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/unused" title="Grandmaster unused">unused</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-black" href="/profile/fatice" title="Unrated, fatice">fatice</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-orange" href="/profile/nuip" title="International master nuip">nuip</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/chemthan" title="Grandmaster chemthan">chemthan</a></li> </ol><p>Have fun! See you next time! (Let's wait and see...)</p></div><p><a href="/blog/entry/54971">Read more »</a></p>

        $(document).ready(function () {
    $(".topic-vote-up-55245").click(function () {
        $.post("/data/topic/vote", {topicId: 55245, _tta: Codeforces.tta(), topicRevisionId: 127550, vote: +1}, function(data) {
            Codeforces.showMessage(data);
        }, "json");
        return false;
    });
    $(".topic-vote-down-55245").click(function () {
        $.post("/data/topic/vote", {topicId: 55245, _tta: Codeforces.tta(), topicRevisionId: 127550, vote: -1}, function(data) {
            Codeforces.showMessage(data);
        }, "json");
        return false;
    });
        });

<script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $(".blogEntry-54961-error").hide();

        $(".attach-blogEntry-54961-to-contest-link").click(function () {
            Codeforces.facebox(".attach-blogEntry-54961-to-contest-form-holder", "http://st.codeforces.com/s/81047");

            $("#facebox .attach-blogEntry-54961-to-contest-form").submit(function () {
                if ($(this).find(":disabled").length === 0) {
                    $("#facebox .blogEntry-
++++++++++++++++++94+++++++++++++++++++++++
54961-error").hide();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-54961-resource-submitting-indicator").show();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-54961-resource-submit").attr("disabled", "disabled");

                    //noinspection JSUnusedGlobalSymbols
                    $.post("/data/blogAndContest?action=attachBlogToContest", {
                        blogId:"989", contestId:$("#facebox #blogEntry-54961-contestId").val(),
                        blogEntryId:"54961",
                        resourceType:$("#facebox #blogEntry-54961-resourceType").val()
                    }, function (json) {
                        var validated = true;

                        for (var key in json) {
                            if (json.hasOwnProperty(key) && key.indexOf("error__") === 0) {
                                validated = false;
                                $("#facebox .blogEntry-54961-" + key.substring("error__".length) + "-error").show();
                                $("#facebox .for__blogEntry-54961-" + key.substring("error__".length)).text(json[key]);
                            }
                        }

                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-54961-resource-submitting-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-54961-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        if (validated) {
                            $.facebox.close();
                            if (json["success"] === "true") {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("Blog has been successfully attached to selected contest");
                            } else {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("There is unexpected error while attaching blog to the contest");
                            }
                        }
                    }, "json");
                }

                return false;
            });

            var contestSelect = $("#blogEntry-54961-contestId");
            var popupContestSele
++++++++++++++++++95+++++++++++++++++++++++
ct = $("#facebox #blogEntry-54961-contestId");

            if (popupContestSelect.is(":disabled")) {
                $.post("/data/contests?action=getContestListWithEditableResources", function (data) {
                    if (data["result"] === "success") {
                        var contests = data["contests"];

                        for (var i = 0, contestCount = contests.length; i < contestCount; ++i) {
                            //noinspection StringLiteralBreaksHTMLJS
                            var contestOptionHtml = "<option value=\"" + contests[i]["id"] + "\">"
                                    + contests[i]["id"] + " - " + contests[i]["name"] + "</option>";
                            contestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                            popupContestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                        }

                        contestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#blogEntry-54961-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#blogEntry-54961-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        popupContestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-54961-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-54961-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");
                    } else {
                        alert("Can't receive contest list");
                    }
                }, "json");
            }

            return false;
        });
    });
</script>

    <div class="content">
        <div class="ttypography"><center> <img src="/predownloaded/d1/0f/d10f26a5c5ba4fa2a31a0b69edc74c7799474e82.png" style="max-width: 100.0%;max-height: 100.0%;" /> </center><p>Hi Codeforces!</p><p>The Codeforces Round #438
++++++++++++++++++96+++++++++++++++++++++++
 by Sberbank and Barcelona Bootcamp (Div. 1 + Div. 2 combined) is going to be held on <a href="https://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?msg=The+Codeforces+Round+%23438+by+Sberbank+and+Barcelona+Bootcamp&amp;iso=20171005T0905&amp;p1=31">05 Oct at 9:05 (UTC+2)</a>! The round will be <strong>rated for everyone</strong>.</p><p>This round is organised in collaboration with <a href="http://in.harbour.space/icpc/acm-icpc-hello-barcelona-bootcamp-autumn-2017/?utm_source=Codeforces">2nd Hello Barcelona ACM ICPC Bootcamp 2017</a> and supported by <a href="http://www.sberbank.com/ru">Sberbank</a>, the biggest commercial and investment bank of Central and Eastern Europe, with over 175 years of history.</p><p>150 students from 53 universities, including ITMO, University of New South Wales, St. Petersburg State University, MIPT, Ural Federal University, Tomsk State University, Novosibirsk State University, Saratov State University, Samara National Research, Perm State University, and many other top global universities such as USA’s highest placing team, Central Florida University, along with Canada’s University of Waterloo, high-scoring Asian teams from Hangzhou Dianzi and Singapore, and Tokyo University, as well as Stockholm’s KTH, will be competing as individuals for the online round, which includes those of you from Codeforces!</p><p>The past week has been full of intense competitions, job interviews with <a href="http://www.sberbank.com/ru">Sberbank</a>, and contest analysis and lectures by Andrey Stankevich (<a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/Andrewzta" title="Grandmaster Andrewzta">Andrewzta</a>), Mike Mirzayanov (<a class="rated-user user-admin" href="/profile/MikeMirzayanov" title="Headquarters, MikeMirzayanov">MikeMirzayanov</a>), Gleb Evstropov (<a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/GlebsHP" title="International Grandmaster GlebsHP">GlebsHP</a>), Artem Vasilyev (<a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/VArtem" title="Grandmaster VArtem">VArtem</a>) and Mikhail Tikhomirov (<a
++++++++++++++++++97+++++++++++++++++++++++
 class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/Endagorion" title="International Grandmaster Endagorion">Endagorion</a>).</p><p><iframe allowfullscreen="" frameborder="0" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/zE2BF9XlNgg" width="560"></iframe></p><p>The event is completely international, as teams from all parts of the globe compete and practice side-by-side. They say a picture is worth a thousand words, so here is a selection to give you some idea of what’s happening at our boot camp.</p><p><a href="http://assets.codeforces.com/photos/BAR2017/900/03_Yoritaka-Handa.jpg" rel="photobox"><img src="http://assets.codeforces.com/photos/BAR2017/150/03_Yoritaka-Handa.jpg" style="max-width: 100.0%;max-height: 100.0%;" /></a> <a href="http://assets.codeforces.com/photos/BAR2017/900/IMG_4014.jpg" rel="photobox"><img src="http://assets.codeforces.com/photos/BAR2017/150/IMG_4014.jpg" style="max-width: 100.0%;max-height: 100.0%;" /></a> <a href="http://assets.codeforces.com/photos/BAR2017/900/IMG_4011.jpg" rel="photobox"><img src="http://assets.codeforces.com/photos/BAR2017/150/IMG_4011.jpg" style="max-width: 100.0%;max-height: 100.0%;" /></a> <a href="http://assets.codeforces.com/photos/BAR2017/900/IMG_4003.jpg" rel="photobox"><img src="http://assets.codeforces.com/photos/BAR2017/150/IMG_4003.jpg" style="max-width: 100.0%;max-height: 100.0%;" /></a> <a href="http://assets.codeforces.com/photos/BAR2017/900/IMG_3974.jpg" rel="photobox"><img src="http://assets.codeforces.com/photos/BAR2017/150/IMG_3974.jpg" style="max-width: 100.0%;max-height: 100.0%;" /></a> <a href="http://assets.codeforces.com/photos/BAR2017/900/IMG_3960.jpg" rel="photobox"><img src="http://assets.codeforces.com/photos/BAR2017/150/IMG_3960.jpg" style="max-width: 100.0%;max-height: 100.0%;" /></a> <a href="http://assets.codeforces.com/photos/BAR2017/900/IMG_3947.jpg" rel="photobox"><img src="http://assets.codeforces.com/photos/BAR2017/150/IMG_3947.jpg" style="max-width: 100.0%;max-height: 100.0%;" /></a> <a href="http://assets.codeforces.com/photos/BAR2

Beijing.</p><p>The round’s creators are <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/Endagorion" title="International Grandmaster Endagorion">Endagorion</a>, <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/ifsmirnov" title="Grandmaster ifsmirnov

">ifsmirnov</a>, <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/zemen" title="International Grandmaster zemen">zemen</a> and <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/Arterm" title="International Grandmaster Arterm">Arterm</a> — team MIPT Jinotega, two-time medalist ACM-ICPC World Final (2016-17). The round is combined for both divisions, will contain seven problems and last for three hours.</p><p>Good luck!</p><p><strong>Scoring: 250-500-1000-1500-2250-2500-3500</strong></p><p><strong>UPD</strong>: Thanks for participating, glory to the winners!</p> <ol>   <li><a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/cubelover" title="International Grandmaster cubelover">cubelover</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-legendary" href="/profile/moejy0viiiiiv" title="Legendary grandmaster moejy0viiiiiv"><span class="legendary-user-first-letter">m</span>oejy0viiiiiv</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/ainta" title="International Grandmaster ainta">ainta</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/zigui" title="Grandmaster zigui">zigui</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/fateice" title="International Grandmaster fateice">fateice</a></li> </ol><p>We will publish the editorial as soon as the Barcelona Bootcamp activities conclude.</p><p><strong>UPD2</strong>: the English <a href="http://codeforces.com/blog/entry/55046">editorial</a> is here.</p></div><p><a href="/blog/entry/54961">Read more »</a></p>

        }, "json");

    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(document).ready(function () {
function handlePaginationKeyboardEvent(right) {
    var pageIndex = parseInt($(".pagination").find("span.active").attr("pageIndex"));
    if (right) {
        pageIndex++;
    } else {
        pageIndex--;
    }
    $(".pagination").find("span[pageIndex=" + pageIndex + "]").each(function () {
        Codeforces.redirect($(this).find("a").attr("href"));
    });
}
$(document).keydown(function (e) {
     var code = (e.keyCode ? e.keyCode : e.which);
     if (e.ctrlKey) {
        if (code == 37 || code == 39) {
            handlePaginationKeyboardEvent(code == 39);
        }
     }
});
        });
    </script>                </div>

            $(function() {
                $(".switchToMobile").click(function() {
                    Codeforces.redirect(Codeforces.updateUrlParameter(document.location.href, "mobile", "true"));
                    return false;
                });
                $(".switchToDesktop").click(function() {
                    Codeforces.redirect(Codeforces.updateUrlParameter(document.location.href, "mobile", "false"));
                    return false;
                });
            });
        </script>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(document).ready(function () {
            if ($(window).width() < 1600) {
                $('.button-up').css('width', '30px').css('line-height', '30px').css('font-size', '20px');
            }

            if ($(window).width() >= 1200) {
                $ (window).scroll (function () {
                    if ($ (this).scrollTop () > 100) {
                        $ ('.button-up').fadeIn();
                    } else {
                        $ ('.button-up').fadeOut();
                    }
                });

                $('.button-up').click(function () {
                    $('body,html').animate({
                        scrollTop: 0
                    }, 500);
                    return false;
                });

                $('.button-up').hover(function () {
                    $(this).animate({
                        'opacity':'1'
                    }).css({'background-color':'#e7ebf0','color':'#6a86a4'});
                }, function () {
++++++++++++++++++104+++++++++++++++++++++++

                    $(this).animate({
                        'opacity':'0.7'
                    }).css({'background':'none','color':'#d3dbe4'});;
                });
            }
            Codeforces.focusOnError();
        });
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(document).ready(function () {
                // Create new 
++++++++++++++++++105+++++++++++++++++++++++
':containsIgnoreCase' selector for search
                jQuery.expr[':'].containsIgnoreCase = function(a, i, m) {
                    return jQuery(a).text().toUpperCase()
                            .indexOf(m[3].toUpperCase()) >= 0;
                };

                if (window.updateDatatableFilter == undefined) {
                    window.updateDatatableFilter = function(i) {
                        var parent = $(i).parent().parent().parent().parent();
                        $("tr.no-items", parent).remove();
                        $("tr", parent).hide().removeClass('visible');
                        var text = $(i).val();
                        if (text) {
                            $("tr" + ":containsIgnoreCase('" + text + "')", parent).show().addClass('visible');
                        } else {
                            parent.find(".rowCount").text("");
                            $("tr", parent).show().addClass('visible');
                        }

                        var found = false;
                        var visibleRowCount = 0;
                        $("tr", parent).each(function () {
                            if (!found) {
                                if ($(this).find("th").size() > 0) {
                                    $(this).show().addClass('visible');
                                    found = true;
                                }
                            }
                            if ($(this).hasClass('visible')) {
                                visibleRowCount++;
                            }
                        });
                        if (text) {
                            parent.find(".rowCount").text("Matches: " + (visibleRowCount - (found ? 1 : 0)));
                        }
                        if (visibleRowCount == (found ? 1 : 0)) {
                            $("<tr class='no-items visible'><td style=\"text-align:left;\"colspan=\"32\">No items<\/td><\/tr>").appendTo($(parent).find('table'));
    
++++++++++++++++++106+++++++++++++++++++++++
                    }
                        $(parent).find("tr td").removeClass("dark");
                        $(parent).find("tr.visible:odd td").addClass("dark");
                    }

                    $(".datatable .closed").click(function () {
                        var parent = $(this).parent();
                        $(this).hide();
                        $(".filter", parent).fadeIn(function () {
                            $("input", parent).val("").focus().css("border", "1px solid #aaa");
                        });
                    });

                    $(".datatable .opened").click(function () {
                        var parent = $(this).parent().parent();
                        $(".filter", parent).fadeOut(function () {
                            $(".closed", parent).show();
                            $("input", parent).val("").each(function () {
                                window.updateDatatableFilter(this);
                            });
                        });
                    });

                    $(".datatable .filter input").keyup(function(e) {
                        window.updateDatatableFilter(this);
                        e.preventDefault();
                        e.stopPropagation();
                    });

                    $(".datatable table").each(function () {
                        var found = false;
                        $("tr", this).each(function () {
                            if (!found && $(this).find("th").size() == 0) {
                                found = true;
                            }
                        });
                        if (!found) {
                            $("<tr class='no-items visible'><td style=\"text-align:left;\"colspan=\"32\">No items<\/td><\/tr>").appendTo(this);
                        }
                    });

                    // Applies styles to datatables.
                    $(".datatable").each(function () {
                        $(this).fi
++++++++++++++++++107+++++++++++++++++++++++
nd("tr:first th").addClass("top");
                        $(this).find("tr:last td").addClass("bottom");
                        $(this).find("tr:odd td").addClass("dark");
                        $(this).find("tr td:first-child, tr th:first-child").addClass("left");
                        $(this).find("tr td:last-child, tr th:last-child").addClass("right");
                    });

                    $(".datatable table.tablesorter").each(function () {
                        $(this).bind("sortEnd", function () {
                            $(".datatable").each(function () {
                                $(this).find("th, td")
                                    .removeClass("top").removeClass("bottom")
                                    .removeClass("left").removeClass("right")
                                    .removeClass("dark");
                                $(this).find("tr:first th").addClass("top");
                                $(this).find("tr:last td").addClass("bottom");
                                $(this).find("tr:odd td").addClass("dark");
                                $(this).find("tr td:first-child, tr th:first-child").addClass("left");
                                $(this).find("tr td:last-child, tr th:last-child").addClass("right");
                            });
                        });
                    });
                }
        });
    </script>
            </div>
        </div>
        <script type="application/javascript">
            $(function() {
                $(".userListMarker").click(function() {
                    $.post("/data/lists", {action: "findTouched"}, function(json) {
                        Codeforces.facebox(".userListsFacebox");
                        var tbody = $("#facebox tbody");
                        tbody.empty();
                        for (var i in json) {
                            tbody.append(
                                    $("<tr></tr>").append(
                                   
++++++++++++++++++108+++++++++++++++++++++++
         $("<td></td>").attr("data-readKey", json[i].readKey).text(json[i].name)
                                    )
                            );
                        }
                        Codeforces.updateDatatables();
                        tbody.find("td").css("cursor", "pointer").click(function() {
                            document.location = Codeforces.updateUrlParameter(document.location.href, "list", $(this).attr("data-readKey"));
                        });
                    }, "json");
                });
            });
        </script>

<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">

<script>
// If we have Navigation Timing, make everything relative to navigationStart. Ow, get a time value as early as possible.
var t_start = (window.performance ? Math.round(performance.timing.navigationStart) : new Date().getTime());
var t_image, t_after_image;

function send_beacon() {
var t_onload_handler = t_image - t_start;
var t_inline_script = t_after_image - t_start;
var t_custom_metric = Math.max(t_onload_handler, t_inline_script);

(new Image()).src = "//beacon.marathon.mesos.vn/?site=" + window.location.hostname + "&time=" + t_custom_metric + "ms";
}

if (window.addEventListener) { // W3C standard
window.addEventListener('load', send_beacon, false);
}
else if (window.attachEvent) { // Microsoft
window.attachEvent('onload', send_beacon);
}
</script>

        var _jsCbArr = [];
        var jsCallback = {
++++++++++++++++++3+++++++++++++++++++++++

            push: function (name, body) {
                _jsCbArr[name] = body;
            },
            exec: function (name, args) {
                if (typeof _jsCbArr[name] == "function") {
                    try {
                        _jsCbArr[name](args);
                    } catch (e) {
                        return;
                    }
                }
            }
        };

        (function () {
            try {
                //check session on client
                if (typeof (Storage) !== "undefined") {
                    var session = sessionStorage.getItem("VisitSession");
                    if (session == null) {
                        //phien lam viec moi
                        sessionStorage.setItem("VisitSession", "1");

                        var hash = window.location.hash;
                        if (hash == "#first") {
                            //link được redirect từ bản mobile sang thì clear hash.
                            window.history.replaceState("", "", window.location.href.split('#')[0]);
                        }
                        else {
                            //nếu không phải link đá từ mobile thì remove cookie ở đây.
                            var setCookie = function (a, c, f) {
                                var e = new Date();
                                e.setTime(e.getTime() + (f * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
                                var b = "expires=" + e.toUTCString();
                                document.cookie = a + "=" + c + "; " + b;
                            };
                            setCookie("browser", "", -1);
                            //reload lại trang để hệ thống chuyển về bản mobile.
                            if (navigator.userAgent.match(/(iPhone|iPod|iPad|Android|BlackBerry|Windows Phone|webOS)/i) != null) {
                                window.location = window.location.href;
                            }
            
++++++++++++++++++4+++++++++++++++++++++++
            }
                    }
                }
            }
            catch (e) {
                console.log("Lỗi check mobile redirect: " + e);
            }
        })();

    </script>
    
    
    

    <link href="https://dantricdn.com/web_css/site.css" rel="stylesheet" />

<script type="text/lazyscript">

    $('[data-elementtype=searchbuttonv2]').click(function () {
        var strSearch = $('[data-elementtype=searchtextv2]').val();
        strSearch=convertHtmlToText(strSearch);
        strSearch = encodeURIComponent(strSearch);
        if (strSearch != '') {
            var url = String.format("/tim-kiem.htm?keywords={0}", strSearch);
            if (document.all) {
                window.location.href = url;
            } else {
                document.location.href = url;
            }
        } else {
            $('[data-elementtype=searchtextv2]').focus();
        }
        return false;
    });

    $('[data-elementtype=searchtextv2]').keypress(function (event) {
        var key;
        if (window.event) {
            key = window.event.keyCode;
        } else {
            key = event.which;
        }
        if (key == 13) {
            $('[data-elementtype=searchbuttonv2]').click();
            return false;
     
++++++++++++++++++7+++++++++++++++++++++++
   }
    });
    $("#searchbox").removeClass('hidden').show();    
</script>

        <a  href="/giao-duc-khuyen-hoc/mat-tich-cuc-cua-ban-kiem-diem-hoc-sinh-cap-1-20171101141028362.htm" title="Mặt t&#237;ch cực của bản kiểm điểm học sinh cấp 1" ><img   title="Mặt t&#237;ch cực của bản kiểm điểm học sinh cấp 1" alt="Mặt t&#237;ch cực của bản kiểm điểm học sinh cấp 1" data-x2="https://dantricdn.com/zoom/130_100/2017/ban-kiem-diem--1509520145283.jpg" src="https://dantricdn.com/zoom/130_100/2017/ban-kiem-diem--1509520145283.jpg" width="130" height="100" /></a><div class="fl wid330"><h4><a href="/giao-duc-khuyen-hoc/mat-tich-cuc-cua-ban-kiem-diem-hoc-sinh-cap-1-20171101141028362.htm" title="Mặt t&#237;ch cực của bản kiểm điểm học sinh cấp 1" class="fon6" data-newstype="0"  data-linktype="newsdetail"   data-id="20171101141028362"  >Mặt tích cực của bản kiểm điểm học sinh cấp 1</a></h4><div class="sapo fon5">(Dân trí) - Con tôi đang học lớp 5. ++++++++++++++++++22+++++++++++++++++++++++
 từ lớp 1, cô giáo mỗi tháng gửi sổ liên lạc về thông báo tình hình học tập của con, tôi đều buồn rầu vì cô phê bình con rất nghịch, hay nói chuyện gây mất trật tự trong giờ học.<br /><a href="/giao-duc-khuyen-hoc/vu-phat-hoc-sinh-nghi-hoc-khong-thong-bao-gia-dinh-co-giao-sai-bi-ky-luat-20171027072530789.htm" title="Vụ phạt học sinh nghỉ học kh&#244;ng th&#244;ng b&#225;o gia đ&#236;nh: C&#244; gi&#225;o sai, bị kỷ luật"><b>&nbsp;&gt;&gt;&nbsp;Vụ phạt học sinh nghỉ học không thông báo gia đình: Cô giáo sai, bị kỷ luật</b></a><br /><a href="/giao-duc-khuyen-hoc/phu-huynh-soc-vi-con-bi-co-giao-phat-nghi-hoc-ma-khong-thong-bao-gia-dinh-2017102607341455.htm" title="Phụ huynh sốc v&#236; con bị c&#244; gi&#225;o phạt nghỉ học m&#224; kh&#244;ng th&#244;ng b&#225;o gia đ&#236;nh"><b>&nbsp;&gt;&gt;&nbsp;Phụ huynh sốc vì con bị cô giáo phạt nghỉ học mà không thông báo gia đình</b></a></div><a class="icon-detail fon7" href="/giao-duc-khuyen-hoc/mat-tich-cuc-cua-ban-kiem-diem-hoc-sinh-cap-1-20171101141028362.htm" rel="nofollow">Xem tiếp</a></div>

++++++++++++++++++38+++++++++++++++++++++++
i ngưỡng mộ, mong muốn hẹn hò. Trong chương trình "Bạn muốn hẹn hò", Thuý được anh Nhựt tỏ tình bằng một màn nhảy ngẫu hứng ấn tượng.<br /><a href="/nhip-song-tre/co-gai-khong-chap-nhan-song-thu-khien-hang-tram-chang-trai-muon-hen-ho-20171028081050485.htm" title="C&#244; g&#225;i &quot;kh&#244;ng chấp nhận sống thử&quot; khiến h&#224;ng trăm ch&#224;ng trai muốn hẹn h&#242;"><b>&nbsp;&gt;&gt;&nbsp;Cô gái "không chấp nhận sống thử" khiến hàng trăm chàng trai muốn hẹn hò</b></a></div><a class="icon-detail fon7" href="/nhip-song-tre/co-gai-khong-chap-nhan-song-thu-duoc-to-tinh-lang-man-20171101125959201.htm" rel="nofollow">Xem tiếp</a></div>

        <a  href="/blog/vu-khaisilk-nguoi-dan-cho-doi-nhieu-hon-nua-o-bo-truong-cong-thuong-20171101050257456.htm" title="Vụ Khaisilk, người d&#226;n chờ đợi nhiều hơn nữa ở Bộ trưởng C&#244;ng Thương" ><img   title="Vụ Khaisilk, người d&#226;n chờ đợi nhiều hơn nữa ở Bộ trưởng C&#244;ng Thương" alt="Vụ Khaisilk, người d&#226;n chờ đợi nhiều hơn nữa ở Bộ trưởng C&#244;ng Thương" data-x2="https://dantricdn.com/zoom/130_100/2017/mkhan-lua-1509487232977.jpg" src="https://dantricdn.com/zoom/130_100/2017/mkhan-lua-1509487232977.jpg" width="130" height="100" /></a><div class="fl wid330"><h4><a href="/blog/vu-khaisilk-nguoi-dan-cho-doi-nhieu-hon-nua-o-bo-truong-cong-thuong-20171101050257456.htm" title="Vụ Khaisilk, người d&#226;n chờ đợi nhiều hơn nữa ở Bộ trưởng C&#244;ng Thương" class="fon6" data-newstype="0"  data-linktype="newsdetail"   data-id="20171101050257456"  >Vụ Khaisilk, người dân chờ đợi nhiều hơn nữa ở Bộ trưởng Công Thương</a></h4><div class="sapo fon5">(Dân trí) - Đã đến lúc lãnh đạo Bộ Công Thương cần xem xét, cơ cấu lại Cục Quản lý Thị trưởng, một đơn vị vốn từng không ít điều tiếng trong quá khứ, cụ thể trong vụ việc này thì “thiếu trách nhiệm, làm báo cáo sơ sài và không làm đúng trọng trách”.<br /><a href="/kinh-doanh/tphcm-tong-kiem-tra-toan-bo-hoat-dong-kinh-doanh-cua-khaisilk-20171031182535972.htm" title="TPHCM tổng kiểm tra to&#224;n bộ hoạt động kinh doanh của Khaisilk"><b>&nbsp;&gt;&gt;&nbsp;TPHCM tổng kiểm tra toàn bộ hoạt động kinh doanh của Khaisilk</b></a><br /><a href="/kinh-doanh/gia-khan-to-tam-trung-quoc-nhap-ve-30000-dong-chiec-khaisilk-ban-gap-hang-chuc-lan-20171031162829894.htm" title="Gi&#225; khăn tơ tằm Trung Quốc 
++++++++++++++++++62+++++++++++++++++++++++
nhập về 30.000 đồng/chiếc, Khaisilk b&#225;n gấp h&#224;ng chục lần"><b>&nbsp;&gt;&gt;&nbsp;Giá khăn tơ tằm Trung Quốc nhập về 30.000 đồng/chiếc, Khaisilk bán gấp hàng chục lần</b></a><br /><a href="/kinh-doanh/vu-khaisilk-tong-cuc-hai-quan-vao-cuoc-truy-so-luong-lua-trung-quoc-nhap-khau-20171031125335347.htm" title="Vụ Khaisilk: Tổng cục Hải quan v&#224;o cuộc &quot;truy&quot; số lượng lụa Trung Quốc nhập khẩu"><b>&nbsp;&gt;&gt;&nbsp;Vụ Khaisilk: Tổng cục Hải quan vào cuộc "truy" số lượng lụa Trung Quốc nhập khẩu</b></a></div><a class="icon-detail fon7" href="/blog/vu-khaisilk-nguoi-dan-cho-doi-nhieu-hon-nua-o-bo-truong-cong-thuong-20171101050257456.htm" rel="nofollow">Xem tiếp</a></div>

                if (typeof (Storage) !== "undefined") {
                    var session = sessionStorage.getItem("VisitSession");
                    if (session == null) {
                        //phien lam viec moi
                        sessionStorage.setItem("VisitSession", "1");

                        }

                            //nếu không phải link đá từ mobile thì remove cookie ở đây.
                            var setCookie = function (a, c, f) {
                                var e = new Date();
                                e.setTime(e.getTime() + (f * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
                                var b = "expires=" + e.toUTCString();
                                document.cookie = a + "=" + c + "; " + b;
                            };
                            setCookie("browser", "", -1);
                            //reload lại trang để hệ thống chuyển về bản mobile.

                                window.location = window.location.href;

                }
            }
            catch (e) {
                console.log("Lỗi check mobile redirect: " + e);

        })();

<script type="text/lazyscript">

    $('[data-elementtype=searchbuttonv2]').click(function () {
        var strSearch = $('[data-elementtype=searchtextv2]').val();
        strSearch=convertHtmlToText(strSearch);
        strSearch = encodeURIComponent(strSearch);
        if (strSearch != '') {
            var url = String.format("/tim-kiem.htm?keywords={0}", strSearch);
            if (document.all) {
                window.location.href = url;
            } else {
                document.location.href = url;
            }
        } else {
            $('[data-elementtype=searchtextv2]').focus();
        }
        return false;
    });

    $('[data-elementtype=searchtextv2]').keypress(function (event) {
        var key;
        if (window.event) {
            key = window.event.keyCode;
        } else {
            key = event.which;
        }
        if (key == 13) {
            $('[data-elementtype=searchbuttonv2]').click();
            return false;
        }
  
++++++++++++++++++7+++++++++++++++++++++++
  });
    $("#searchbox").removeClass('hidden').show();    
</script>

Cậu lớn lên trong vòng tay yêu thương của mẹ nhưng rồi mẹ cũng đột ngột qua đời, để lại cho Nam đứa em gái cùng mẹ khác cha mới hơn 4 tuổi.                                 var e = new Date();
                                e.setTime(e.getTime() + (f * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
                                var b = "expires=" + e.toUTCString();
                                document.cookie = a + "=" + c + "; " + b;
                            };
                            setCookie("browser", "", -1);

<script type="text/lazyscript">

    $('[data-elementtype=searchbuttonv2]').click(function () {
        var strSearch = $('[data-elementtype=searchtextv2]').val();
        strSearch=convertHtmlToText(strSearch);
        strSearch = encodeURIComponent(strSearch);
        if (strSearch != '') {
            var url = String.format("/tim-kiem.htm?keywords={0}", strSearch);
            if (document.all) {
                window.location.href = url;
            } else {
                document.location.href = url;
            }
        } else {
            $('[data-elementtype=searchtextv2]').focus();
        }
        return false;
    });

    $('[data-elementtype=searchtextv2]').keypress(function (event) {
        var key;
        if (window.event) {
            key = window.event.keyCode;
        } else {
            key = event.which;
        }
        if (key == 13) {
            $('[data-elementtype=searchbuttonv2]').click();
            return false;
        }
  
++++++++++++++++++7+++++++++++++++++++++++
  });
    $("#searchbox").removeClass('hidden').show();    
</script>

Cậu lớn lên trong vòng tay yêu thương của mẹ nhưng rồi mẹ cũng đột ngột qua đời, để lại cho Nam đứa em gái cùng mẹ khác cha mới hơn 4 tuổi. Điều mà trước giờ chưa từng có tiền lệ. Thậm chí có một số cửa hàng cho rằng sẽ mua với giá cao trước ngày mở bán, từ 100 đến 200 triệu đồng.<br /><a href="/suc-manh-so/nhieu-cua-hang-chao-ban-iphone-x-gia-40-trieu-dong-nhan-hang-3-11-20171031134256695.htm" title="Nhiều cửa h&#224;ng ch&#224;o b&#225;n iPhone X gi&#225; 40 triệu đồng, nhận h&#224;ng 3/11"><b>&nbsp;&gt;&gt;&nbsp;Nhiều cửa hàng chào bán iPhone X giá 40 triệu đồng, nhận hàng 3/11</b></a
++++++++++++++++++42+++++++++++++++++++++++
><br /><a href="/suc-manh-so/iphone-x-se-co-gia-soc-khi-ve-viet-nam-trong-ngay-dau-tien-20171030135856507.htm" title="iPhone X sẽ c&#243; gi&#225; &quot;sốc&quot; khi về Việt Nam trong ng&#224;y đầu ti&#234;n"><b>&nbsp;&gt;&gt;&nbsp;iPhone X sẽ có giá "sốc" khi về Việt Nam trong ngày đầu tiên</b></a></div><a class="icon-detail fon7" href="/suc-manh-so/rao-gia-iphone-x-200-trieu-dong-truoc-ngay-mo-ban-cung-co-nguoi-mua-20171101161048479.htm" rel="nofollow">Xem tiếp</a></div>

Giữa phố đông, hai ông bà không ngần ngại mà trao nhau nụ hôn dịu ngọt, những ánh mắt đong đầy cảm xúc và nụ cười của niềm hạnh phúc trào dâng.</div><a class="icon-detail fon7" href="/doi-song/bo-anh-cuoi-cua-co-dau-chu-re-u70-va-chuyen-tinh-trong-mo-dang-nguong-mo-20171101065340746.htm" rel="nofollow">Xem tiếp</a></div>
